123 
124 // ============= u8g.h ====================
125 
126 /*
127 
128  u8g.h
129 
130  Universal 8bit Graphics Library
131 
132  Copyright (c) 2011, olikraus@gmail.com
133  All rights reserved.
134 
135  Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
136  are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
137 
138  * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list
139  of conditions and the following disclaimer.
140 
141  * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this
142  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other
143  materials provided with the distribution.
144 
145  THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND
146  CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
147  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
148  MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE
149  DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR
150  CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
151  SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT
152  NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
153  LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
154  CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT,
155  STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE)
156  ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF
157  ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
158 
159 */
160 
161 #ifndef _U8G_H
162 #define _U8G_H
163 
164 
165 /* uncomment the following line to support displays larger than 240x240 */
166 //#define U8G_16BIT 1
167 
168 /* comment the following line to generate more compact but interrupt unsafe code */
169 #define U8G_INTERRUPT_SAFE 1
170 
171 
172 #include <stddef.h>
173 
174 #ifdef __18CXX
175 typedef unsigned char uint8_t;
176 typedef signed char int8_t;
177 typedef unsigned short uint16_t;
178 typedef signed short int16_t;
179 #else
180 #include <stdint.h>
181 #endif
182 
183 #if defined(__AVR__)
184 #include <avr/pgmspace.h>
185 #endif
186 
187 /*
188  use the com interface directly on any systems which are not AVR or ARDUINO
189 */
190 #if defined(__AVR__) || defined(ARDUINO)
191 #define U8G_WITH_PINLIST
192 #endif
193 
194 
195 #ifdef __cplusplus
196 extern "C" {
197 #endif
198 
199 
200 /*===============================================================*/
201 #ifdef __GNUC__
202 # define U8G_NOINLINE __attribute__((noinline))
203 # define U8G_PURE __attribute__ ((pure))
204 # define U8G_NOCOMMON __attribute__ ((nocommon))
205 # define U8G_SECTION(name) __attribute__ ((section (name)))
206 # if defined(__MSPGCC__)
207 /* mspgcc does not have .progmem sections. Use -fdata-sections. */
208 # define U8G_FONT_SECTION(name)
209 # endif
210 # if defined(__AVR__)
211 # define U8G_FONT_SECTION(name) U8G_SECTION(".progmem." name)
212 # endif
213 #else
214 # define U8G_NOINLINE
215 # define U8G_PURE
216 # define U8G_NOCOMMON
217 # define U8G_SECTION(name)
218 #endif
219 
220 #ifndef U8G_FONT_SECTION
221 # define U8G_FONT_SECTION(name)
222 #endif
223 
224 
225 /*===============================================================*/
226 /* flash memory access */
227 
228 #if defined(__AVR__)
229 /* U8G_PROGMEM is used by the XBM example */
230 #define U8G_PROGMEM U8G_SECTION(".progmem.data")
231 typedef uint8_t PROGMEM u8g_pgm_uint8_t;
232 typedef uint8_t u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t;
233 #define u8g_pgm_read(adr) pgm_read_byte_near(adr)
234 #define U8G_PSTR(s) ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)PSTR(s))
235 
236 #else
237 
238 #define U8G_PROGMEM
239 #define PROGMEM
240 typedef uint8_t u8g_pgm_uint8_t;
241 typedef uint8_t u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t;
242 #define u8g_pgm_read(adr) (*(const u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)(adr))
243 #define U8G_PSTR(s) ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)(s))
244 
245 #endif
246 
247 /*===============================================================*/
248 /* interrupt safe code */
249 #if defined(U8G_INTERRUPT_SAFE)
250 # if defined(__AVR__)
251 extern uint8_t global_SREG_backup; /* u8g_state.c */
252 # define U8G_ATOMIC_START() do { global_SREG_backup = SREG; cli(); } while(0)
253 # define U8G_ATOMIC_END() SREG = global_SREG_backup
254 # define U8G_ATOMIC_OR(ptr, val) do { uint8_t tmpSREG = SREG; cli(); (*(ptr) |= (val)); SREG = tmpSREG; } while(0)
255 # define U8G_ATOMIC_AND(ptr, val) do { uint8_t tmpSREG = SREG; cli(); (*(ptr) &= (val)); SREG = tmpSREG; } while(0)
256 # else
257 # define U8G_ATOMIC_OR(ptr, val) (*(ptr) |= (val))
258 # define U8G_ATOMIC_AND(ptr, val) (*(ptr) &= (val))
259 # define U8G_ATOMIC_START()
260 # define U8G_ATOMIC_END()
261 # endif /* __AVR__ */
262 #else
263 # define U8G_ATOMIC_OR(ptr, val) (*(ptr) |= (val))
264 # define U8G_ATOMIC_AND(ptr, val) (*(ptr) &= (val))
265 # define U8G_ATOMIC_START()
266 # define U8G_ATOMIC_END()
267 #endif /* U8G_INTERRUPT_SAFE */
268 
269 
270 /*===============================================================*/
271 /* forward */
272 typedef struct _u8g_t u8g_t;
273 typedef struct _u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_t;
274 
275 typedef struct _u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t;
276 typedef struct _u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t;
277 typedef struct _u8g_box_t u8g_box_t;
278 typedef struct _u8g_dev_arg_irgb_t u8g_dev_arg_irgb_t;
279 
280 
281 /*===============================================================*/
282 /* generic */
283 #if defined(U8G_16BIT)
284 typedef uint16_t u8g_uint_t;
285 typedef int16_t u8g_int_t;
286 #else
287 typedef uint8_t u8g_uint_t;
288 typedef int8_t u8g_int_t;
289 #endif
290 
291 #ifdef OBSOLETE
292 struct _u8g_box_t
293 {
294  u8g_uint_t x0, y0, x1, y1;
295 };
296 typedef struct _u8g_box_t u8g_box_t;
297 #endif /* OBSOLETE */
298 
299 
300 /*===============================================================*/
301 /* device structure */
302 
303 #ifdef __XC8
304 /* device prototype */
305 typedef uint8_t (*u8g_dev_fnptr)(void *u8g, void *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg);
306 
307 /* com prototype */
308 typedef uint8_t (*u8g_com_fnptr)(void *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr);
309 #else
310 /* device prototype */
311 typedef uint8_t (*u8g_dev_fnptr)(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg);
312 
313 /* com prototype */
314 typedef uint8_t (*u8g_com_fnptr)(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr);
315 #endif
316 
317 
318 
319 struct _u8g_dev_t
320 {
321  u8g_dev_fnptr dev_fn; /* device procedure */
322  void *dev_mem; /* device memory */
323  u8g_com_fnptr com_fn; /* communication procedure */
324 };
325 
326 
327 /*===============================================================*/
328 /* device list */
329 
330 /* Size: 128x64 SDL, u8g_dev_sdl.c */
331 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_sdl_1bit;
332 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_sdl_1bit_h;
333 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_sdl_2bit;
334 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_sdl_2bit_double_mem;
335 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_sdl_8bit;
336 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_sdl_hicolor;
337 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_sdl_fullcolor;
338 int u8g_sdl_get_key(void);
339 
340 /* Size: 70x30 monochrom, stdout */
341 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_stdout;
342 
343 /* Size: monochrom, writes "u8g.pbm" */
344 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_pbm;
345 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_pbm_8h1;
346 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_pbm_8h2; /* grayscale simulation */
347 
348 /* Size: 128x64 monochrom, no output, used for performance measure */
349 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_gprof;
350

468 /* T6963, all t6963 devices have double page (2x) */

473 /* Display: EA DOGXL160, Size: 160x104 monochrom & gray level */

475 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_uc1610_dogxl160_bw_hw_spi;

480 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_uc1610_dogxl160_2x_bw_hw_spi;
481 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_uc1610_dogxl160_2x_gr_sw_spi;
482 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_uc1610_dogxl160_2x_gr_hw_spi;
483 
484 /* Display: Generic KS0108b, Size: 128x64 monochrom */
485 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_ks0108_128x64; /* official Arduino Library interface */
486 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_ks0108_128x64_fast; /* faster, but uses private tables from the Arduino Library */
487 
488 /* Nokia 84x48 Display with PCD8544 */
489 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_pcd8544_84x48_sw_spi;

599 /* u8g_virtual_screen.c */
600 extern u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_vs;
601 
602 
603 /*===============================================================*/
604 /* device messages */
605 
606 struct _u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t
607 {
608  u8g_uint_t x, y; /* will be modified */
609  uint8_t pixel; /* will be modified, pixel sequence or transparency value */
610  uint8_t dir;
611  uint8_t color; /* color or index value, red value for true color mode */
612  uint8_t hi_color; /* high byte for 64K color mode, low byte is in "color", green value for true color mode */
613  uint8_t blue; /* blue value in true color mode */
614 };
615 /* typedef struct _u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t; */ /* forward decl */
616 
617 /* range for r,g,b: 0..255 */
618 #define U8G_GET_HICOLOR_BY_RGB(r,g,b) (((uint16_t)((r)&0x0f8))<<8)|(((uint16_t)((g)&0x0fc))<<3)|(((uint16_t)((b)>>3)))
619 
620 struct _u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t
621 {
622  u8g_uint_t x, y, w, h;
623 };
624 /* typedef struct _u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t; */ /* forward decl */
625 
626 struct _u8g_box_t
627 {
628  u8g_uint_t x0, y0, x1, y1;
629 };
630 /* typedef struct _u8g_box_t u8g_box_t; */ /* forward decl */
631 
632 struct _u8g_dev_arg_irgb_t
633 {
634  u8g_uint_t idx, r, g, b; /* index with rgb value */
635 };
636 /* typedef struct _u8g_dev_arg_irgb_t u8g_dev_arg_irgb_t; */ /* forward decl */
637 
638 
639 
640 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT 10
641 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP 11
642 
643 /* arg: pointer to uint8_t, contranst value between 0 and 255 */
644 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_CONTRAST 15
645 
646 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_ON 16
647 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_OFF 17
648 
649 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_FIRST 20
650 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT 21
651 
652 /* arg: u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t * */
653 /* new algorithm with U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_PAGE_BOX makes this msg obsolete */
654 /* #define U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION 22 */
655 
656 /* arg: u8g_box_t *, fill structure with current page properties */
657 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_PAGE_BOX 23
658 
659 /*
660 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_PRIMITIVE_START 30
661 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_PRIMITIVE_END 31
662 */
663 
664 /* arg: u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t * */
665 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_TPIXEL 44
666 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_4TPIXEL 45
667 
668 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_PIXEL 50
669 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_8PIXEL 59
670 
671 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_COLOR_ENTRY 60
672 
673 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_XY_CB 61
674 
675 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_WIDTH 70
676 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_HEIGHT 71
677 #define U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_MODE 72
678 
679 /*===============================================================*/
680 /* device modes */
681 #define U8G_MODE(is_index_mode, is_color, bits_per_pixel) (((is_index_mode)<<6) | ((is_color)<<5)|(bits_per_pixel))
682 
683 #define U8G_MODE_UNKNOWN 0
684 #define U8G_MODE_BW U8G_MODE(0, 0, 1)
685 #define U8G_MODE_GRAY2BIT U8G_MODE(0, 0, 2)
686 #define U8G_MODE_R3G3B2 U8G_MODE(0, 1, 8)
687 #define U8G_MODE_INDEX U8G_MODE(1, 1, 8)
688 /* hicolor is R5G6B5 */
689 #define U8G_MODE_HICOLOR U8G_MODE(0, 1, 16)
690 /* truecolor */
691 #define U8G_MODE_TRUECOLOR U8G_MODE(0, 1, 24)
692 
693 
694 #define U8G_MODE_GET_BITS_PER_PIXEL(mode) ((mode)&31)
695 #define U8G_MODE_IS_COLOR(mode) (((mode)&32)==0?0:1)
696 #define U8G_MODE_IS_INDEX_MODE(mode) (((mode)&64)==0?0:1)
697 
698 
699 /*===============================================================*/
700 /* com options */
701 
702 /* uncomment the following line for Atmega HW SPI double speed, issue 89 */
703 /* #define U8G_HW_SPI_2X 1 */
704 
705 /* com messages */
706 
707 #define U8G_COM_MSG_STOP 0
708 #define U8G_COM_MSG_INIT 1
709 
710 #define U8G_COM_MSG_ADDRESS 2
711 
712 /* CHIP_SELECT argument: number of the chip which needs to be activated, so this is more like high active */
713 #define U8G_COM_MSG_CHIP_SELECT 3
714 
715 #define U8G_COM_MSG_RESET 4
716 
717 #define U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_BYTE 5
718 #define U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ 6
719 #define U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ_P 7
720 
721 
722 /* com driver */
723 uint8_t u8g_com_null_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_null.c */
724 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_std_sw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_std_sw_spi.c */
725 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_hw_usart_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_atmega_hw_usart_spi.c */
726 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_sw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_sw_spi.c */
727 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_hw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_hw_spi.c */
728 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_ATtiny85_std_hw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_arduino_ATTiny85_std_hw_spi.c */
729 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_st7920_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_st7920_spi.c */
730 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_st7920_custom_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_st7920_custom.c */
731 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_st7920_hw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_st7920_hw_spi.c */
732 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_parallel_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_parallel.c */
733 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_fast_parallel_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_fast_parallel.c */
734 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_port_d_wr_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_port_d_wr.c */
735 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_no_en_parallel_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_no_en_parallel.c */
736 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_ssd_i2c_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_ssd_i2c.c */
737 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_t6963_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_arduino_t6963.c */
738 
739 
740 uint8_t u8g_com_atmega_hw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_atmega_hw_spi.c */
741 uint8_t u8g_com_atmega_sw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_atmega_sw_spi.c */
742 uint8_t u8g_com_atmega_st7920_sw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_atmega_st7920_spi.c */

744 uint8_t u8g_com_atmega_parallel_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr); /* u8g_com_atmega_parallel.c */
745 
746 
747 /*
748  Translation of system specific com drives to generic com names
749  At the moment, the following generic com drives are available
750  U8G_COM_HW_SPI
751  U8G_COM_SW_SPI
752  U8G_COM_PARALLEL
753  U8G_COM_T6963
754  U8G_COM_FAST_PARALLEL
755  U8G_COM_SSD_I2C
756 
757 defined(__18CXX) || defined(__PIC32MX)
758 
759 */
760 /* ==== HW SPI, Arduino ====*/
761 #if defined(ARDUINO)
762 #if defined(__AVR__)
763 
764 #if defined(__AVR_ATtiny85__)
765 #define U8G_COM_HW_SPI u8g_com_arduino_ATtiny85_std_hw_spi_fn
766 #define U8G_COM_ST7920_HW_SPI u8g_com_null_fn
767 #else
768 
769 #define U8G_COM_HW_SPI u8g_com_arduino_hw_spi_fn
770 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega32U4__)
771 #define U8G_COM_HW_USART_SPI u8g_com_arduino_hw_usart_spi_fn
772 #endif /* __AVR_ATmega32U4__ */
773 #define U8G_COM_ST7920_HW_SPI u8g_com_arduino_st7920_hw_spi_fn
774 #endif /* __AVR_ATtiny85__ */
775 
776 #elif defined(__18CXX) || defined(__PIC32MX)
777 #define U8G_COM_HW_SPI u8g_com_null_fn
778 #define U8G_COM_ST7920_HW_SPI u8g_com_null_fn
779 #elif defined(__arm__) /* Arduino Due */
780 #define U8G_COM_HW_SPI u8g_com_arduino_hw_spi_fn
781 #define U8G_COM_ST7920_HW_SPI u8g_com_null_fn
782 #endif
783 #endif
784 /* ==== HW SPI, not Arduino ====*/
785 #ifndef U8G_COM_HW_SPI
786 #if defined(__AVR__)
787 #define U8G_COM_HW_SPI u8g_com_atmega_hw_spi_fn
788 #define U8G_COM_ST7920_HW_SPI u8g_com_atmega_st7920_hw_spi_fn
789 #endif
790 #endif
791 #ifndef U8G_COM_HW_SPI
792 #define U8G_COM_HW_SPI u8g_com_null_fn
793 #define U8G_COM_ST7920_HW_SPI u8g_com_null_fn
794 #endif
795 
796 #ifndef U8G_COM_HW_USART_SPI
797 #define U8G_COM_HW_USART_SPI u8g_com_null_fn
798 #endif
799 
800 
801 /* ==== SW SPI, Arduino ====*/
802 #if defined(ARDUINO)
803 #if defined(__AVR__)
804 #define U8G_COM_SW_SPI u8g_com_arduino_sw_spi_fn
805 #define U8G_COM_ST7920_SW_SPI u8g_com_arduino_st7920_spi_fn
806 #elif defined(__18CXX) || defined(__PIC32MX)
807 #define U8G_COM_SW_SPI u8g_com_arduino_sw_spi_fn
808 #define U8G_COM_ST7920_SW_SPI u8g_com_arduino_st7920_spi_fn
809 #elif defined(__arm__) /* Arduino Due */
810 //#define U8G_COM_SW_SPI u8g_com_arduino_std_sw_spi_fn
811 #define U8G_COM_SW_SPI u8g_com_arduino_sw_spi_fn
812 #define U8G_COM_ST7920_SW_SPI u8g_com_arduino_st7920_spi_fn
813 #endif
814 #endif
815 
816 #ifndef U8G_COM_SW_SPI
817 /* ==== SW SPI, not Arduino ====*/
818 #if defined(__AVR__)
819 #define U8G_COM_SW_SPI u8g_com_atmega_sw_spi_fn
820 #define U8G_COM_ST7920_SW_SPI u8g_com_atmega_st7920_sw_spi_fn
821 #endif
822 #endif
823 #ifndef U8G_COM_SW_SPI
824 #define U8G_COM_SW_SPI u8g_com_null_fn
825 #define U8G_COM_ST7920_SW_SPI u8g_com_null_fn
826 #endif
827 
828 /* ==== Parallel iinterface, Arduino ====*/
829 #if defined(ARDUINO)
830 #if defined(__AVR__)
831 #define U8G_COM_PARALLEL u8g_com_arduino_parallel_fn
832 #define U8G_COM_FAST_PARALLEL u8g_com_arduino_fast_parallel_fn
833 #define U8G_COM_T6963 u8g_com_arduino_t6963_fn
834 #else /* Arduino Due, Chipkit PIC32 */
835 #define U8G_COM_PARALLEL u8g_com_arduino_parallel_fn
836 #define U8G_COM_FAST_PARALLEL u8g_com_arduino_parallel_fn
837 #define U8G_COM_T6963 u8g_com_null_fn
838 #endif
839 #endif
840 #ifndef U8G_COM_PARALLEL
841 #if defined(__AVR__)
842 #define U8G_COM_PARALLEL u8g_com_atmega_parallel_fn
843 #define U8G_COM_FAST_PARALLEL u8g_com_atmega_parallel_fn
844 #define U8G_COM_T6963 u8g_com_null_fn
845 #endif
846 #endif
847 #ifndef U8G_COM_PARALLEL
848 #define U8G_COM_PARALLEL u8g_com_null_fn
849 #define U8G_COM_FAST_PARALLEL u8g_com_null_fn
850 #define U8G_COM_T6963 u8g_com_null_fn
851 #endif
852 
853 #if defined(ARDUINO)
854 #if defined(__AVR__)
855 #define U8G_COM_SSD_I2C u8g_com_arduino_ssd_i2c_fn
856 #endif
857 #endif
858 
859 #ifndef U8G_COM_SSD_I2C
860 #if defined(__AVR__) || defined(__SAM3X8E__)
861 /* AVR variant can use the arduino version at the moment */
862 #define U8G_COM_SSD_I2C u8g_com_arduino_ssd_i2c_fn
863 #endif
864 #endif
865 #ifndef U8G_COM_SSD_I2C
866 #define U8G_COM_SSD_I2C u8g_com_null_fn
867 #endif
868 
869 
870 
871 /*===============================================================*/
872 /* com api */
873 
874 #define U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_50NS 1
875 #define U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_300NS 2
876 #define U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_400NS 3
877 #define U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_500NS 4
878 #define U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_NONE 255
879 
880 uint8_t u8g_InitCom(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t clk_cycle_time);
881 void u8g_StopCom(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev);
882 void u8g_EnableCom(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev); /* obsolete */
883 void u8g_DisableCom(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev); /* obsolete */
884 void u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t cs);
885 void u8g_SetResetLow(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev);
886 void u8g_SetResetHigh(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev);
887 void u8g_SetAddress(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t address);
888 uint8_t u8g_WriteByte(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t val);
889 uint8_t u8g_WriteSequence(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t cnt, uint8_t *seq);
890 uint8_t u8g_WriteSequenceP(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t cnt, const uint8_t *seq);
891 
892 
893 
894 #define U8G_ESC_DLY(x) 255, ((x) & 0x7f)
895 #define U8G_ESC_CS(x) 255, (0xd0 | ((x)&0x0f))
896 #define U8G_ESC_ADR(x) 255, (0xe0 | ((x)&0x0f))
897 #define U8G_ESC_RST(x) 255, (0xc0 | ((x)&0x0f))
898 #define U8G_ESC_VCC(x) 255, (0xbe | ((x)&0x01))
899 #define U8G_ESC_END 255, 254
900 #define U8G_ESC_255 255, 255
901 //uint8_t u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, u8g_pgm_uint8_t *esc_seq);
902 uint8_t u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, const uint8_t *esc_seq);
903 
904 
905 /* u8g_com_api_16gr.c */

935 /*===============================================================*/
936 /* page */
937 struct _u8g_page_t
938 {
939  u8g_uint_t page_height;
940  u8g_uint_t total_height;
941  u8g_uint_t page_y0;
942  u8g_uint_t page_y1;
943  uint8_t page;
944 };
945 typedef struct _u8g_page_t u8g_page_t;
946 
947 void u8g_page_First(u8g_page_t *p) U8G_NOINLINE; /* u8g_page.c */
948 void u8g_page_Init(u8g_page_t *p, u8g_uint_t page_height, u8g_uint_t total_height ) U8G_NOINLINE; /* u8g_page.c */
949 uint8_t u8g_page_Next(u8g_page_t *p) U8G_NOINLINE; /* u8g_page.c */
950 
951 /*===============================================================*/
952 /* page buffer (pb) */
953 
954 struct _u8g_pb_t
955 {
956  u8g_page_t p;
957  u8g_uint_t width; /* pixel width */
958  void *buf;
959 };
960 typedef struct _u8g_pb_t u8g_pb_t;
961 
962 
963 /* u8g_pb.c */
964 void u8g_pb_Clear(u8g_pb_t *b);
965 uint8_t u8g_pb_IsYIntersection(u8g_pb_t *pb, u8g_uint_t v0, u8g_uint_t v1);
966 uint8_t u8g_pb_IsXIntersection(u8g_pb_t *b, u8g_uint_t v0, u8g_uint_t v1);
967 uint8_t u8g_pb_IsIntersection(u8g_pb_t *pb, u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t *bbx);
968 void u8g_pb_GetPageBox(u8g_pb_t *pb, u8g_box_t *box);
969 uint8_t u8g_pb_Is8PixelVisible(u8g_pb_t *b, u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *arg_pixel);
970 uint8_t u8g_pb_WriteBuffer(u8g_pb_t *b, u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev);
971 
972 /*
973  note on __attribute__ ((nocommon))
974  AVR scripts often use --gc-sections on the linker to remove unused section.
975  This works fine for initialed data and text sections. In principle .bss is also
976  handled, but the name##_pb definition is not removed. Reason is, that
977  array definitions are placed in the COMMON section, by default
978  The attribute "nocommon" removes this automatic assignment to the
979  COMMON section and directly puts it into .bss. As a result, if more
980  than one buffer is defined in one file, then it will be removed with --gc-sections
981 
982  .. not sure if Arduino IDE uses -fno-common... if yes, then the attribute is
983  redundant.
984 */
985 #define U8G_PB_DEV(name, width, height, page_height, dev_fn, com_fn) \
986 uint8_t name##_buf[width] U8G_NOCOMMON ; \
987 u8g_pb_t name##_pb = { {page_height, height, 0, 0, 0}, width, name##_buf}; \
988 u8g_dev_t name = { dev_fn, &name##_pb, com_fn }
989 
990 
991 void u8g_pb8v1_Init(u8g_pb_t *b, void *buf, u8g_uint_t width) U8G_NOINLINE;
992 void u8g_pb8v1_Clear(u8g_pb_t *b) U8G_NOINLINE;
993 
994 uint8_t u8g_pb8v1_IsYIntersection(u8g_pb_t *b, u8g_uint_t v0, u8g_uint_t v1);
995 uint8_t u8g_pb8v1_IsXIntersection(u8g_pb_t *b, u8g_uint_t v0, u8g_uint_t v1);
996 uint8_t u8g_pb8v1_WriteBuffer(u8g_pb_t *b, u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev);
997

1044 /*===============================================================*/
1045 /* u8g_ll_api.c */
1046 
1047 /* cursor draw callback */
1048 typedef void (*u8g_draw_cursor_fn)(u8g_t *u8g);
1049 
1050 /* vertical reference point calculation callback */
1051 typedef u8g_uint_t (*u8g_font_calc_vref_fnptr)(u8g_t *u8g);
1052 
1053 /* state backup and restore procedure */
1054 typedef void (*u8g_state_cb)(uint8_t msg);
1055 
1056 
1057 /* PI = Pin Index */
1058 
1059 /* reset pin, usually optional */
1060 #define U8G_PI_RESET 0
1061 
1062 /* address / data or instruction */
1063 #define U8G_PI_A0 1
1064 #define U8G_PI_DI 1
1065 
1066 /* chip select line */
1067 #define U8G_PI_CS 2
1068 #define U8G_PI_CS1 2
1069 #define U8G_PI_CS2 3
1070 /* Feb 2013: A0 state moved from 7 to 3 for t6963 controller*/
1071 #define U8G_PI_A0_STATE 3
1072 
1073 /* enable / clock signal */
1074 #define U8G_PI_EN 4
1075 #define U8G_PI_CS_STATE 4
1076 #define U8G_PI_SCK 4
1077 #define U8G_PI_SCL 4
1078 #define U8G_PI_RD 4
1079 
1080 
1081 /* data pins, shared with SPI and I2C pins */
1082 #define U8G_PI_D0 5
1083 #define U8G_PI_MOSI 5
1084 #define U8G_PI_SDA 5
1085 #define U8G_PI_D1 6
1086 #define U8G_PI_MISO 6
1087 #define U8G_PI_D2 7
1088 #define U8G_PI_D3 8
1089 #define U8G_PI_SET_A0 8
1090 #define U8G_PI_D4 9
1091 #define U8G_PI_D5 10
1092 #define U8G_PI_I2C_OPTION 11
1093 #define U8G_PI_D6 11
1094 #define U8G_PI_D7 12
1095 
1096 /* read/write pin, must be the last pin in the list, this means U8G_PIN_LIST_LEN = U8G_PI_RW + 1*/
1097 #define U8G_PI_WR 13
1098 #define U8G_PI_RW 13
1099 
1100 #define U8G_PIN_LIST_LEN 14
1101 
1102 
1103 #define U8G_PIN_DUMMY 254
1104 #define U8G_PIN_NONE 255
1105 
1106 #define U8G_FONT_HEIGHT_MODE_TEXT 0
1107 #define U8G_FONT_HEIGHT_MODE_XTEXT 1
1108 #define U8G_FONT_HEIGHT_MODE_ALL 2
1109 
1110 struct _u8g_t
1111 {
1112  u8g_uint_t width;
1113  u8g_uint_t height;
1114 
1115 
1116  u8g_dev_t *dev; /* first device in the device chain */
1117  const u8g_pgm_uint8_t *font; /* regular font for all text procedures */
1118  const u8g_pgm_uint8_t *cursor_font; /* special font for cursor procedures */
1119  uint8_t cursor_fg_color, cursor_bg_color;
1120  uint8_t cursor_encoding;
1121  uint8_t mode; /* display mode, one of U8G_MODE_xxx */
1122  u8g_uint_t cursor_x;
1123  u8g_uint_t cursor_y;
1124  u8g_draw_cursor_fn cursor_fn;
1125 
1126  int8_t glyph_dx;
1127  int8_t glyph_x;
1128  int8_t glyph_y;
1129  uint8_t glyph_width;
1130  uint8_t glyph_height;
1131 
1132  u8g_font_calc_vref_fnptr font_calc_vref;
1133  uint8_t font_height_mode;
1134  int8_t font_ref_ascent;
1135  int8_t font_ref_descent;
1136  uint8_t font_line_spacing_factor; /* line_spacing = factor * (ascent - descent) / 64 */
1137  uint8_t line_spacing;
1138 
1139  u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t arg_pixel;
1140  /* uint8_t color_index; */
1141 
1142 #ifdef U8G_WITH_PINLIST
1143  uint8_t pin_list[U8G_PIN_LIST_LEN];
1144 #endif
1145 
1146  u8g_state_cb state_cb;
1147 
1148  u8g_box_t current_page; /* current box of the visible page */
1149 
1150 };
1151 
1152 #define u8g_GetFontAscent(u8g) ((u8g)->font_ref_ascent)
1153 #define u8g_GetFontDescent(u8g) ((u8g)->font_ref_descent)
1154 #define u8g_GetFontLineSpacing(u8g) ((u8g)->line_spacing)
1155 
1156 uint8_t u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg);
1157 
1158 uint8_t u8g_InitLL(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev);
1159 void u8g_FirstPageLL(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev);
1160 uint8_t u8g_NextPageLL(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev);
1161 uint8_t u8g_SetContrastLL(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t contrast);
1162 void u8g_DrawPixelLL(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y);
1163 void u8g_Draw8PixelLL(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t dir, uint8_t pixel);

1165 uint8_t u8g_IsBBXIntersectionLL(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, u8g_uint_t w, u8g_uint_t h); /* obsolete */

1172 uint8_t u8g_InitComFn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, u8g_com_fnptr com_fn); /* Init procedure for anything which is not Arduino or AVR (e.g. ARM, but not Due, which is Arduino) */
1173 uint8_t u8g_InitSPI(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t sck, uint8_t mosi, uint8_t cs, uint8_t a0, uint8_t reset);

1178  uint8_t en, uint8_t cs1, uint8_t cs2, uint8_t di, uint8_t rw, uint8_t reset);

1180  uint8_t cs, uint8_t a0, uint8_t wr, uint8_t rd, uint8_t reset);

1182 uint8_t u8g_NextPage(u8g_t *u8g);

1215 /* u8g_state.c */
1216 #define U8G_STATE_ENV_IDX 0
1217 #define U8G_STATE_U8G_IDX 1
1218 #define U8G_STATE_RESTORE 0
1219 #define U8G_STATE_BACKUP 1
1220 #define U8G_STATE_MSG_COMPOSE(cmd,idx) (((cmd)<<1) | (idx))
1221 
1222 #define U8G_STATE_MSG_RESTORE_ENV U8G_STATE_MSG_COMPOSE(U8G_STATE_RESTORE,U8G_STATE_ENV_IDX)
1223 #define U8G_STATE_MSG_BACKUP_ENV U8G_STATE_MSG_COMPOSE(U8G_STATE_BACKUP,U8G_STATE_ENV_IDX)
1224 #define U8G_STATE_MSG_RESTORE_U8G U8G_STATE_MSG_COMPOSE(U8G_STATE_RESTORE,U8G_STATE_U8G_IDX)
1225 #define U8G_STATE_MSG_BACKUP_U8G U8G_STATE_MSG_COMPOSE(U8G_STATE_BACKUP,U8G_STATE_U8G_IDX)
1226 
1227 #define U8G_STATE_MSG_GET_IDX(msg) ((msg)&1)
1228 #define U8G_STATE_MSG_IS_BACKUP(msg) ((msg)&2)
1229 
1230 
1231 
1232 void u8g_state_dummy_cb(uint8_t msg);
1233 void u8g_backup_spi(uint8_t msg); /* backup SPI state controller */
1234 /* backward compatible definition */
1235 #define u8g_backup_avr_spi u8g_backup_spi
1236 
1237 void u8g_SetHardwareBackup(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_state_cb backup_cb);

1411 /* options for u8g_i2c_init() */
1412 #define U8G_I2C_OPT_NONE 0
1413 #define U8G_I2C_OPT_NO_ACK 2
1414 #define U8G_I2C_OPT_DEV_0 0
1415 #define U8G_I2C_OPT_DEV_1 4
1416 #define U8G_I2C_OPT_FAST 16
1417 
1418 /* u8g_com_i2c.c */
1419 
1420 /* retrun values from u8g_twi_get_error() */
1421 #define U8G_I2C_ERR_NONE 0x00
1422 /* the following values are bit masks */
1423 #define U8G_I2C_ERR_TIMEOUT 0x01
1424 #define U8G_I2C_ERR_BUS 0x02
1425

2369  89,105,32,80,248,136,80,80,216,136,248,2,89,105,32,112,
2370  248,112,112,112,248,168,248,2,89,105,32,80,216,80,216,80,
2371  80,80,112,2,89,105,32,80,216,80,216,80,216,136,248,3,
2372  85,101,160,240,136,240,160,2,88,104,248,128,176,160,144,16,
2373  8,8,2,88,104,128,128,64,72,40,104,8,248,2,88,104,

2424  19,53,101,32,96,224,96,32,19,53,101,32,96,160,96,32,
2425  3,101,101,12,60,252,60,12,3,101,101,12,52,196,52,12,

2430  112,168,168,168,112,2,87,103,112,136,168,216,168,136,112,2,

2435  105,8,56,120,120,248,120,120,56,8,2,89,105,128,224,240,

2439  120,180,204,252,252,252,5,51,99,32,64,128,53,51,99,128,
2440  64,32,50,51,99,32,64,128,2,51,99,128,64,32,5,99,
2441  99,48,72,132,2,99,99,132,72,48,2,85,101,8,24,56,
2442  120,248,2,85,101,128,192,224,240,248,2,85,101,248,240,224,
2443  192,128,2,85,101,248,120,56,24,8,2,85,101,112,136,136,
2444  136,112,2,85,101,248,232,232,232,248,2,85,101,248,184,184,
2445  184,248,2,85,101,248,248,232,200,248,2,85,101,248,152,184,
2446  248,248,2,85,101,248,168,168,168,248,2,87,103,32,32,80,
2447  112,168,136,248,2,87,103,32,32,112,112,232,232,248,2,87,
2448  103,32,32,112,112,184,184,248,2,103,103,48,72,132,132,132,
2449  72,48,2,85,101,248,168,232,136,248,2,85,101,248,136,232,
2450  168,248,2,85,101,248,136,184,168,248,2,85,101,248,168,184,

2454  24,8,3,85,101,128,192,160,144,248,20,68,100,240,144,144,
2455  240,19,68,100,240,240,240,240,20,68,100,240,144,144,240,20,

2457 // ======== u8g_dev_st7920_128x64.c ==============
2458 
2459 /*
2460 
2461  u8g_dev_st7920_128x64.c
2462

2466  All rights reserved.
2467 
2468  Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
2469  are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
2470 
2471  * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list
2472  of conditions and the following disclaimer.
2473 
2474  * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this
2475  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other
2476  materials provided with the distribution.
2477 
2478  THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND
2479  CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
2480  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
2481  MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE
2482  DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR
2483  CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
2484  SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT
2485  NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
2486  LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
2487  CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT,

2489  ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF

2495 
2496 #define WIDTH 128
2497 #define HEIGHT 64
2498 #define PAGE_HEIGHT 8
2499 
2500 
2501 /* init sequence from https://github.com/adafruit/ST7565-LCD/blob/master/ST7565/ST7565.cpp */
2502 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_init_seq[] PROGMEM = {
2503  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
2504  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
2505  U8G_ESC_RST(15), /* do reset low pulse with (15*16)+2 milliseconds (=maximum delay)*/
2506  U8G_ESC_DLY(100), /* 8 Dez 2012: additional delay 100 ms because of reset*/
2507  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
2508  U8G_ESC_DLY(50), /* delay 50 ms */
2509 
2510  0x038, /* 8 Bit interface (DL=1), basic instruction set (RE=0) */
2511  0x00c, /* display on, cursor & blink off; 0x08: all off */
2512  0x006, /* Entry mode: Cursor move to right ,DDRAM address counter (AC) plus 1, no shift */
2513  0x002, /* disable scroll, enable CGRAM adress */
2514  0x001, /* clear RAM, needs 1.6 ms */
2515  U8G_ESC_DLY(100), /* delay 100 ms */
2516 
2517  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
2518  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
2519 };
2520 
2521 uint8_t u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
2522 {
2523  switch(msg)
2524  {
2525  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
2526  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_400NS);
2527  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_init_seq);
2528  break;
2529  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
2530  break;
2531  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
2532  {
2533  uint8_t y, i;
2534  uint8_t *ptr;
2535  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
2536 
2537  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 0); /* cmd mode */
2538  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 1);
2539  y = pb->p.page_y0;
2540  ptr = (uint8_t*)pb->buf;
2541  for( i = 0; i < 8; i ++ )
2542  {
2543  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 0); /* cmd mode */
2544  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x03e ); /* enable extended mode */
2545 
2546  if ( y < 32 )
2547  {
2548  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x080 | y ); /* y pos */
2549  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x080 ); /* set x pos to 0*/
2550  }
2551  else
2552  {
2553  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x080 | (y-32) ); /* y pos */
2554  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x080 | 8); /* set x pos to 64*/
2555  }
2556 
2557  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
2558  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, WIDTH/8, ptr);
2559  ptr += WIDTH/8;
2560  y++;
2561  }
2562  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
2563  }
2564  break;
2565  }
2566  return u8g_dev_pb8h1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
2567 }
2568 
2569 uint8_t u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
2570 {
2571  switch(msg)
2572  {
2573  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
2574  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_400NS);
2575  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_init_seq);
2576  break;
2577  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
2578  break;
2579  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
2580  {
2581  uint8_t y, i;
2582  uint8_t *ptr;
2583  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
2584 
2585  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 0); /* cmd mode */
2586  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 1);
2587  y = pb->p.page_y0;
2588  ptr = (uint8_t*)pb->buf;
2589  for( i = 0; i < 32; i ++ )
2590  {
2591  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 0); /* cmd mode */
2592  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x03e ); /* enable extended mode */
2593 
2594  if ( y < 32 )
2595  {
2596  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x080 | y ); /* y pos */
2597  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x080 ); /* set x pos to 0*/
2598  }
2599  else
2600  {
2601  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x080 | (y-32) ); /* y pos */
2602  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x080 | 8); /* set x pos to 64*/
2603  }
2604 
2605  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
2606  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, WIDTH/8, ptr);
2607  ptr += WIDTH/8;
2608  y++;
2609  }
2610  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
2611  }
2612  break;
2613  }
2614  return u8g_dev_pb32h1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
2615 }
2616 
2617 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_sw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_ST7920_SW_SPI);
2618 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_hw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_ST7920_HW_SPI);
2619 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_8bit, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_FAST_PARALLEL);
2620 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_custom, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_fn, u8g_com_arduino_st7920_custom_fn);
2621 
2622 
2623 
2624 #define QWIDTH (WIDTH*4)
2625 uint8_t u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_buf[QWIDTH] U8G_NOCOMMON ;
2626 u8g_pb_t u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_pb = { {32, HEIGHT, 0, 0, 0}, WIDTH, u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_buf};
2627 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_sw_spi = { u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_fn, &u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_pb, U8G_COM_ST7920_SW_SPI };
2628 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_hw_spi = { u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_fn, &u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_pb, U8G_COM_ST7920_HW_SPI };
2629 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_8bit = { u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_fn, &u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_pb, U8G_COM_FAST_PARALLEL };
2630 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_custom = { u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_fn, &u8g_dev_st7920_128x64_4x_pb, u8g_com_arduino_st7920_custom_fn };
2631 
2632 // ================ u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64.c ==========
2633 
2634 /*
2635 
2636  u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64.c
2637 
2638  Universal 8bit Graphics Library
2639 
2640  Copyright (c) 2011, olikraus@gmail.com
2641  All rights reserved.
2642 
2643  Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
2644  are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
2645 
2646  * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list
2647  of conditions and the following disclaimer.
2648 
2649  * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this
2650  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other
2651  materials provided with the distribution.
2652 
2653  THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND
2654  CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
2655  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
2656  MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE
2657  DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR
2658  CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
2659  SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT
2660  NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
2661  LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
2662  CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT,
2663  STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE)
2664  ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF
2665  ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.

2669 
2670 #define WIDTH 128
2671 #define HEIGHT 64
2672 #define PAGE_HEIGHT 8
2673 
2674 /* init sequence adafruit 128x64 OLED (NOT TESTED) */
2675 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_adafruit1_init_seq[] PROGMEM = {
2676  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
2677  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
2678  U8G_ESC_RST(1), /* do reset low pulse with (1*16)+2 milliseconds */
2679  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
2680 
2681  0x0ae, /* display off, sleep mode */
2682  0x0d5, 0x080, /* clock divide ratio (0x00=1) and oscillator frequency (0x8) */
2683  0x0a8, 0x03f, /* */
2684 
2685  0x0d3, 0x000, /* */
2686 
2687  0x040, /* start line */
2688 
2689  0x08d, 0x010, /* [1] charge pump setting (p62): 0x014 enable, 0x010 disable */
2690 
2691  0x020, 0x000, /* */
2692  0x0a1, /* segment remap a0/a1*/
2693  0x0c8, /* c0: scan dir normal, c8: reverse */
2694  0x0da, 0x012, /* com pin HW config, sequential com pin config (bit 4), disable left/right remap (bit 5) */
2695  0x081, 0x09f, /* [1] set contrast control */
2696  0x0d9, 0x022, /* [1] pre-charge period 0x022/f1*/
2697  0x0db, 0x040, /* vcomh deselect level */
2698 
2699  0x02e, /* 2012-05-27: Deactivate scroll */
2700  0x0a4, /* output ram to display */
2701  0x0a6, /* none inverted normal display mode */
2702  0x0af, /* display on */
2703 
2704  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
2705  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
2706 };
2707 
2708 /* init sequence adafruit 128x64 OLED (NOT TESTED) */
2709 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_adafruit2_init_seq[] PROGMEM = {
2710  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
2711  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
2712  U8G_ESC_RST(1), /* do reset low pulse with (1*16)+2 milliseconds */
2713  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
2714 
2715  0x0ae, /* display off, sleep mode */
2716  0x0d5, 0x080, /* clock divide ratio (0x00=1) and oscillator frequency (0x8) */
2717  0x0a8, 0x03f, /* */
2718 
2719  0x0d3, 0x000, /* */
2720 
2721  0x040, /* start line */
2722 
2723  0x08d, 0x014, /* [2] charge pump setting (p62): 0x014 enable, 0x010 disable */
2724 
2725  0x020, 0x000, /* */
2726  0x0a1, /* segment remap a0/a1*/
2727  0x0c8, /* c0: scan dir normal, c8: reverse */
2728  0x0da, 0x012, /* com pin HW config, sequential com pin config (bit 4), disable left/right remap (bit 5) */
2729  0x081, 0x0cf, /* [2] set contrast control */
2730  0x0d9, 0x0f1, /* [2] pre-charge period 0x022/f1*/
2731  0x0db, 0x040, /* vcomh deselect level */
2732 
2733  0x02e, /* 2012-05-27: Deactivate scroll */
2734  0x0a4, /* output ram to display */
2735  0x0a6, /* none inverted normal display mode */
2736  0x0af, /* display on */
2737 
2738  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
2739  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
2740 };
2741 
2742 /* init sequence adafruit 128x64 OLED (NOT TESTED), like adafruit3, but with page addressing mode */
2743 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_adafruit3_init_seq[] PROGMEM = {
2744  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
2745  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
2746  U8G_ESC_RST(1), /* do reset low pulse with (1*16)+2 milliseconds */
2747  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
2748 
2749  0x0ae, /* display off, sleep mode */
2750  0x0d5, 0x080, /* clock divide ratio (0x00=1) and oscillator frequency (0x8) */
2751  0x0a8, 0x03f, /* */
2752 
2753  0x0d3, 0x000, /* */
2754 
2755  0x040, /* start line */
2756 
2757  0x08d, 0x014, /* [2] charge pump setting (p62): 0x014 enable, 0x010 disable */
2758 
2759  0x020, 0x002, /* 2012-05-27: page addressing mode */
2760  0x0a1, /* segment remap a0/a1*/
2761  0x0c8, /* c0: scan dir normal, c8: reverse */
2762  0x0da, 0x012, /* com pin HW config, sequential com pin config (bit 4), disable left/right remap (bit 5) */
2763  0x081, 0x0cf, /* [2] set contrast control */
2764  0x0d9, 0x0f1, /* [2] pre-charge period 0x022/f1*/
2765  0x0db, 0x040, /* vcomh deselect level */
2766 
2767  0x02e, /* 2012-05-27: Deactivate scroll */
2768  0x0a4, /* output ram to display */
2769  0x0a6, /* none inverted normal display mode */
2770  0x0af, /* display on */
2771 
2772  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
2773  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
2774 };
2775 
2776 /* init sequence Univision datasheet (NOT TESTED) */
2777 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_univision_init_seq[] PROGMEM = {
2778  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
2779  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
2780  U8G_ESC_RST(1), /* do reset low pulse with (1*16)+2 milliseconds */
2781  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
2782 
2783  0x0ae, /* display off, sleep mode */
2784  0x0d5, 0x080, /* clock divide ratio (0x00=1) and oscillator frequency (0x8) */
2785  0x0a8, 0x03f, /* multiplex ratio */
2786  0x0d3, 0x000, /* display offset */
2787  0x040, /* start line */
2788  0x08d, 0x010, /* charge pump setting (p62): 0x014 enable, 0x010 disable */
2789  0x0a1, /* segment remap a0/a1*/
2790  0x0c8, /* c0: scan dir normal, c8: reverse */
2791  0x0da, 0x012, /* com pin HW config, sequential com pin config (bit 4), disable left/right remap (bit 5) */
2792  0x081, 0x09f, /* set contrast control */
2793  0x0d9, 0x022, /* pre-charge period */
2794  0x0db, 0x040, /* vcomh deselect level */
2795  0x022, 0x000, /* page addressing mode WRONG: 3 byte cmd! */
2796  0x0a4, /* output ram to display */
2797  0x0a6, /* none inverted normal display mode */
2798  0x0af, /* display on */
2799  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
2800  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
2801 };
2802 
2803 /* select one init sequence here */
2804 //#define u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_init_seq u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_univision_init_seq
2805 //#define u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_init_seq u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_adafruit1_init_seq
2806 // 26. Apr 2014: in this thead: http://forum.arduino.cc/index.php?topic=234930.msg1696754;topicseen#msg1696754
2807 // it is mentiond, that adafruit2_init_seq works better --> this will be used by the ssd1306_adafruit device
2808 //#define u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_init_seq u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_adafruit2_init_seq
2809 
2810 #define u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_init_seq u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_adafruit3_init_seq
2811 
2812 
2813 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_data_start[] PROGMEM = {
2814  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
2815  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
2816  0x010, /* set upper 4 bit of the col adr to 0 */
2817  0x000, /* set lower 4 bit of the col adr to 0 */
2818  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
2819 };
2820 
2821 /* the sh1106 is compatible to the ssd1306, but is 132x64. display seems to be centered */
2822 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_data_start[] PROGMEM = {
2823  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
2824  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
2825  0x010, /* set upper 4 bit of the col adr to 0 */
2826  0x002, /* set lower 4 bit of the col adr to 2 (centered display with sh1106) */
2827  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
2828 };
2829 
2830 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_on[] PROGMEM = {
2831  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
2832  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
2833  0x0ae, /* display off */
2834  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip, bugfix 12 nov 2014 */
2835  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
2836 };
2837 
2838 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_off[] PROGMEM = {
2839  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
2840  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
2841  0x0af, /* display on */
2842  U8G_ESC_DLY(50), /* delay 50 ms */
2843  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip, bugfix 12 nov 2014 */
2844  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
2845 };
2846 
2847 uint8_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
2848 {
2849  switch(msg)
2850  {
2851  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
2852  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_300NS);
2853  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_adafruit2_init_seq);
2854  break;
2855  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
2856  break;
2857  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
2858  {
2859  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
2860  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_data_start);
2861  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | pb->p.page); /* select current page (SSD1306) */
2862  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
2863  if ( u8g_pb_WriteBuffer(pb, u8g, dev) == 0 )
2864  return 0;
2865  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
2866  }
2867  break;
2868  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_ON:
2869  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_on);
2870  return 1;
2871  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_OFF:
2872  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_off);
2873  return 1;
2874  }
2875  return u8g_dev_pb8v1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
2876 }
2877 
2878 uint8_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_adafruit_128x64_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
2879 {
2880  switch(msg)
2881  {
2882  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
2883  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_300NS);
2884  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_init_seq);
2885  break;
2886  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
2887  break;
2888  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
2889  {
2890  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
2891  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_data_start);
2892  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | pb->p.page); /* select current page (SSD1306) */
2893  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
2894  if ( u8g_pb_WriteBuffer(pb, u8g, dev) == 0 )
2895  return 0;
2896  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
2897  }
2898  break;
2899  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_ON:
2900  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_on);
2901  return 1;
2902  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_OFF:
2903  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_off);
2904  return 1;
2905  }
2906  return u8g_dev_pb8v1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
2907 }
2908 
2909 uint8_t u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
2910 {
2911  switch(msg)
2912  {
2913  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
2914  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_300NS);
2915  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_init_seq);
2916  break;
2917  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
2918  break;
2919  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
2920  {
2921  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
2922  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_data_start);
2923  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | pb->p.page); /* select current page (SSD1306) */
2924  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
2925  if ( u8g_pb_WriteBuffer(pb, u8g, dev) == 0 )
2926  return 0;
2927  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
2928  }
2929  break;
2930  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_ON:
2931  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_on);
2932  return 1;
2933  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_OFF:
2934  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_off);
2935  return 1;
2936  }
2937  return u8g_dev_pb8v1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
2938 }
2939 
2940 
2941 uint8_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
2942 {
2943  switch(msg)
2944  {
2945  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
2946  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_300NS);
2947  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_init_seq);
2948  break;
2949  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
2950  break;
2951  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
2952  {
2953  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
2954 
2955  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_data_start);
2956  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | (pb->p.page*2)); /* select current page (SSD1306) */
2957  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
2958  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, pb->width, (uint8_t *)pb->buf);
2959  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
2960 
2961  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_data_start);
2962  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | (pb->p.page*2+1)); /* select current page (SSD1306) */
2963  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
2964  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, pb->width, (uint8_t *)(pb->buf)+pb->width);
2965  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
2966  }
2967  break;
2968  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_ON:
2969  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_on);
2970  return 1;
2971  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_OFF:
2972  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_off);
2973  return 1;
2974  }
2975  return u8g_dev_pb16v1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
2976 }
2977 
2978 uint8_t u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
2979 {
2980  switch(msg)
2981  {
2982  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
2983  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_300NS);
2984  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_init_seq);
2985  break;
2986  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
2987  break;
2988  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
2989  {
2990  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
2991 
2992  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_data_start);
2993  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | (pb->p.page*2)); /* select current page (SSD1306) */
2994  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
2995  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, pb->width, (uint8_t *)pb->buf);
2996  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
2997 
2998  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_data_start);
2999  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | (pb->p.page*2+1)); /* select current page (SSD1306) */
3000  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
3001  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, pb->width, (uint8_t *)(pb->buf)+pb->width);
3002  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
3003  }
3004  break;
3005  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_ON:
3006  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_on);
3007  return 1;
3008  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_OFF:
3009  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ssd13xx_sleep_off);
3010  return 1;
3011  }
3012  return u8g_dev_pb16v1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
3013 }
3014 
3015 
3016 
3017 
3018 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_sw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_SW_SPI);
3019 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_hw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_HW_SPI);
3020 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_i2c, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_SSD_I2C);
3021 
3022 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_ssd1306_adafruit_128x64_sw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_ssd1306_adafruit_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_SW_SPI);
3023 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_ssd1306_adafruit_128x64_hw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_ssd1306_adafruit_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_HW_SPI);
3024 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_ssd1306_adafruit_128x64_i2c, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_ssd1306_adafruit_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_SSD_I2C);
3025 
3026 
3027 uint8_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_buf[WIDTH*2] U8G_NOCOMMON ;
3028 u8g_pb_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_pb = { {16, HEIGHT, 0, 0, 0}, WIDTH, u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_buf};
3029 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_sw_spi = { u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_fn, &u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_pb, U8G_COM_SW_SPI };
3030 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_hw_spi = { u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_fn, &u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_pb, U8G_COM_HW_SPI };
3031 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_i2c = { u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_fn, &u8g_dev_ssd1306_128x64_2x_pb, U8G_COM_SSD_I2C };
3032 
3033 
3034 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_sw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_SW_SPI);
3035 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_hw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_HW_SPI);
3036 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_i2c, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_SSD_I2C);
3037 
3038 uint8_t u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_buf[WIDTH*2] U8G_NOCOMMON ;
3039 u8g_pb_t u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_pb = { {16, HEIGHT, 0, 0, 0}, WIDTH, u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_buf};
3040 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_sw_spi = { u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_fn, &u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_pb, U8G_COM_SW_SPI };
3041 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_hw_spi = { u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_fn, &u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_pb, U8G_COM_HW_SPI };
3042 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_i2c = { u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_fn, &u8g_dev_sh1106_128x64_2x_pb, U8G_COM_SSD_I2C };

3062  of conditions and the following disclaimer.

3065  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other

3084 
3085 
3086 /* font api */
3087 
3088 /* pointer to the start adress of the glyph, points to progmem area */
3089 typedef void * u8g_glyph_t;
3090 
3091 /* size of the font data structure, there is no struct or class... */
3092 #define U8G_FONT_DATA_STRUCT_SIZE 17
3093 
3094 /*
3095  ... instead the fields of the font data structure are accessed directly by offset
3096  font information
3097  offset
3098  0 font format
3099  1 FONTBOUNDINGBOX width unsigned
3100  2 FONTBOUNDINGBOX height unsigned
3101  3 FONTBOUNDINGBOX x-offset signed
3102  4 FONTBOUNDINGBOX y-offset signed
3103  5 capital A height unsigned
3104  6 start 'A'
3105  8 start 'a'
3106  10 encoding start
3107  11 encoding end
3108  12 descent 'g' negative: below baseline
3109  13 font max ascent
3110  14 font min decent negative: below baseline
3111  15 font xascent
3112  16 font xdecent negative: below baseline
3113 
3114 */
3115 
3116 /* use case: What is the width and the height of the minimal box into which string s fints? */
3117 void u8g_font_GetStrSize(const void *font, const char *s, u8g_uint_t *width, u8g_uint_t *height);
3118 void u8g_font_GetStrSizeP(const void *font, const char *s, u8g_uint_t *width, u8g_uint_t *height);
3119 
3120 /* use case: lower left edge of a minimal box is known, what is the correct x, y position for the string draw procedure */
3121 void u8g_font_AdjustXYToDraw(const void *font, const char *s, u8g_uint_t *x, u8g_uint_t *y);
3122 void u8g_font_AdjustXYToDrawP(const void *font, const char *s, u8g_uint_t *x, u8g_uint_t *y);
3123 
3124 /* use case: Baseline origin known, return minimal box */
3125 void u8g_font_GetStrMinBox(u8g_t *u8g, const void *font, const char *s, u8g_uint_t *x, u8g_uint_t *y, u8g_uint_t *width, u8g_uint_t *height);
3126 
3127 /* procedures */
3128 
3129 /*========================================================================*/
3130 /* low level byte and word access */
3131 
3132 /* removed NOINLINE, because it leads to smaller code, might also be faster */
3133 //static uint8_t u8g_font_get_byte(const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t *font, uint8_t offset) U8G_NOINLINE;
3134 static uint8_t u8g_font_get_byte(const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t *font, uint8_t offset)
3135 {
3136  font += offset;
3137  return u8g_pgm_read( (u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)font );
3138 }
3139 
3140 static uint16_t u8g_font_get_word(const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t *font, uint8_t offset) U8G_NOINLINE;
3141 static uint16_t u8g_font_get_word(const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t *font, uint8_t offset)
3142 {
3143  uint16_t pos;
3144  font += offset;
3145  pos = u8g_pgm_read( (u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)font );
3146  font++;
3147  pos <<= 8;
3148  pos += u8g_pgm_read( (u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)font);
3149  return pos;
3150 }
3151 
3152 /*========================================================================*/
3153 /* direct access on the font */
3154 
3155 static uint8_t u8g_font_GetFormat(const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t *font) U8G_NOINLINE;
3156 static uint8_t u8g_font_GetFormat(const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t *font)
3157 {
3158  return u8g_font_get_byte((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 0);
3159 }
3160 
3161 static uint8_t u8g_font_GetFontGlyphStructureSize(const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t *font) U8G_NOINLINE;
3162 static uint8_t u8g_font_GetFontGlyphStructureSize(const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t *font)
3163 {
3164  switch(u8g_font_GetFormat((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font))
3165  {
3166  case 0: return 6;
3167  case 1: return 3;
3168  case 2: return 6;
3169  }
3170  return 3;
3171 }
3172 
3173 static uint8_t u8g_font_GetBBXWidth(const void *font)
3174 {
3175  return u8g_font_get_byte((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 1);
3176 }
3177 
3178 static uint8_t u8g_font_GetBBXHeight(const void *font)
3179 {
3180  return u8g_font_get_byte((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 2);
3181 }
3182 
3183 static int8_t u8g_font_GetBBXOffX(const void *font)
3184 {
3185  return u8g_font_get_byte((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 3);
3186 }
3187 
3188 static int8_t u8g_font_GetBBXOffY(const void *font)
3189 {
3190  return u8g_font_get_byte((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 4);
3191 }
3192 
3193 uint8_t u8g_font_GetCapitalAHeight(const void *font)
3194 {
3195  return u8g_font_get_byte((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 5);
3196 }
3197 
3198 uint16_t u8g_font_GetEncoding65Pos(const void *font) U8G_NOINLINE;
3199 uint16_t u8g_font_GetEncoding65Pos(const void *font)
3200 {
3201  return u8g_font_get_word((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 6);
3202 }
3203 
3204 uint16_t u8g_font_GetEncoding97Pos(const void *font) U8G_NOINLINE;
3205 uint16_t u8g_font_GetEncoding97Pos(const void *font)
3206 {
3207  return u8g_font_get_word((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 8);
3208 }
3209 
3210 uint8_t u8g_font_GetFontStartEncoding(const void *font)
3211 {
3212  return u8g_font_get_byte((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 10);
3213 }
3214 
3215 uint8_t u8g_font_GetFontEndEncoding(const void *font)
3216 {
3217  return u8g_font_get_byte((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 11);
3218 }
3219 
3220 int8_t u8g_font_GetLowerGDescent(const void *font)
3221 {
3222  return u8g_font_get_byte((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 12);
3223 }
3224 
3225 int8_t u8g_font_GetFontAscent(const void *font)
3226 {
3227  return u8g_font_get_byte((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 13);
3228 }
3229 
3230 int8_t u8g_font_GetFontDescent(const void *font)

3233 }
3234 
3235 int8_t u8g_font_GetFontXAscent(const void *font)

3238 }
3239 
3240 int8_t u8g_font_GetFontXDescent(const void *font)
3241 {
3242  return u8g_font_get_byte((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font, 16);
3243 }
3244 
3245 
3246 /* return the data start for a font and the glyph pointer */
3247 static uint8_t *u8g_font_GetGlyphDataStart(const void *font, u8g_glyph_t g)
3248 {
3249  return ((u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t *)g) + u8g_font_GetFontGlyphStructureSize((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font);
3250 }
3251 
3252 /* calculate the overall length of the font, only used to create the picture for the google wiki */
3253 size_t u8g_font_GetSize(const void *font)
3254 {
3255  uint8_t *p = (uint8_t *)(font);
3256  uint8_t font_format = u8g_font_GetFormat((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font);
3257  uint8_t data_structure_size = u8g_font_GetFontGlyphStructureSize((const u8g_fntpgm_uint8_t*)font);
3258  uint8_t start, end;
3259  uint8_t i;
3260  uint8_t mask = 255;
3261 
3262  start = u8g_font_GetFontStartEncoding(font);
3263  end = u8g_font_GetFontEndEncoding(font);
3264 
3265  if ( font_format == 1 )
3266  mask = 15;
3267 
3268  p += U8G_FONT_DATA_STRUCT_SIZE; /* skip font general information */
3269 
3270  i = start;
3271  for(;;)
3272  {
3273  if ( u8g_pgm_read((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)(p)) == 255 )
3274  {
3275  p += 1;
3276  }
3277  else
3278  {
3279  p += u8g_pgm_read( ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)(p)) + 2 ) & mask;
3280  p += data_structure_size;
3281  }
3282  if ( i == end )
3283  break;
3284  i++;
3285  }
3286 
3287  return p - (uint8_t *)font;
3288 }
3289 
3290 /*========================================================================*/
3291 /* u8g interface, font access */
3292 
3293 uint8_t u8g_GetFontBBXWidth(u8g_t *u8g)
3294 {
3295  return u8g_font_GetBBXWidth(u8g->font);
3296 }
3297 
3298 uint8_t u8g_GetFontBBXHeight(u8g_t *u8g)
3299 {
3300  return u8g_font_GetBBXHeight(u8g->font);
3301 }
3302 
3303 int8_t u8g_GetFontBBXOffX(u8g_t *u8g) U8G_NOINLINE;
3304 int8_t u8g_GetFontBBXOffX(u8g_t *u8g)
3305 {
3306  return u8g_font_GetBBXOffX(u8g->font);
3307 }
3308 
3309 int8_t u8g_GetFontBBXOffY(u8g_t *u8g) U8G_NOINLINE;
3310 int8_t u8g_GetFontBBXOffY(u8g_t *u8g)
3311 {
3312  return u8g_font_GetBBXOffY(u8g->font);
3313 }
3314 
3315 uint8_t u8g_GetFontCapitalAHeight(u8g_t *u8g) U8G_NOINLINE;
3316 uint8_t u8g_GetFontCapitalAHeight(u8g_t *u8g)
3317 {
3318  return u8g_font_GetCapitalAHeight(u8g->font);
3319 }
3320 
3321 /*========================================================================*/
3322 /* glyph handling */
3323 
3324 static void u8g_CopyGlyphDataToCache(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_glyph_t g)
3325 {
3326  uint8_t tmp;
3327  switch( u8g_font_GetFormat(u8g->font) )
3328  {
3329  case 0:
3330  case 2:
3331  /*
3332  format 0
3333  glyph information
3334  offset
3335  0 BBX width unsigned
3336  1 BBX height unsigned
3337  2 data size unsigned (BBX width + 7)/8 * BBX height
3338  3 DWIDTH signed
3339  4 BBX xoffset signed
3340  5 BBX yoffset signed
3341  byte 0 == 255 indicates empty glyph
3342  */
3343  u8g->glyph_width = u8g_pgm_read( ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)g) + 0 );
3344  u8g->glyph_height = u8g_pgm_read( ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)g) + 1 );
3345  u8g->glyph_dx = u8g_pgm_read( ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)g) + 3 );
3346  u8g->glyph_x = u8g_pgm_read( ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)g) + 4 );
3347  u8g->glyph_y = u8g_pgm_read( ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)g) + 5 );
3348  break;
3349  case 1:
3350  default:
3351  /*
3352 format 1
3353  0 BBX xoffset signed --> upper 4 Bit
3354  0 BBX yoffset signed --> lower 4 Bit
3355  1 BBX width unsigned --> upper 4 Bit
3356  1 BBX height unsigned --> lower 4 Bit
3357  2 data size unsigned -(BBX width + 7)/8 * BBX height --> lower 4 Bit
3358  2 DWIDTH signed --> upper 4 Bit
3359  byte 0 == 255 indicates empty glyph
3360  */
3361 
3362  tmp = u8g_pgm_read( ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)g) + 0 );
3363  u8g->glyph_y = tmp & 15;
3364  u8g->glyph_y-=2;
3365  tmp >>= 4;
3366  u8g->glyph_x = tmp;
3367 
3368  tmp = u8g_pgm_read( ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)g) + 1 );
3369  u8g->glyph_height = tmp & 15;
3370  tmp >>= 4;
3371  u8g->glyph_width = tmp;
3372 
3373  tmp = u8g_pgm_read( ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)g) + 2 );
3374  tmp >>= 4;
3375  u8g->glyph_dx = tmp;
3376 
3377 
3378  break;
3379  }
3380 }
3381 
3382 //void u8g_FillEmptyGlyphCache(u8g_t *u8g) U8G_NOINLINE;
3383 static void u8g_FillEmptyGlyphCache(u8g_t *u8g)
3384 {
3385  u8g->glyph_dx = 0;
3386  u8g->glyph_width = 0;
3387  u8g->glyph_height = 0;
3388  u8g->glyph_x = 0;
3389  u8g->glyph_y = 0;
3390 }
3391 
3392 /*
3393  Find (with some speed optimization) and return a pointer to the glyph data structure
3394  Also uncompress (format 1) and copy the content of the data structure to the u8g structure
3395 */
3396 u8g_glyph_t u8g_GetGlyph(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t requested_encoding)
3397 {
3398  uint8_t *p = (uint8_t *)(u8g->font);
3399  uint8_t font_format = u8g_font_GetFormat(u8g->font);
3400  uint8_t data_structure_size = u8g_font_GetFontGlyphStructureSize(u8g->font);
3401  uint8_t start, end;
3402  uint16_t pos;
3403  uint8_t i;
3404  uint8_t mask = 255;
3405 
3406  if ( font_format == 1 )
3407  mask = 15;
3408 
3409  start = u8g_font_GetFontStartEncoding(u8g->font);
3410  end = u8g_font_GetFontEndEncoding(u8g->font);
3411 
3412  pos = u8g_font_GetEncoding97Pos(u8g->font);
3413  if ( requested_encoding >= 97 && pos > 0 )
3414  {
3415  p+= pos;
3416  start = 97;
3417  }
3418  else
3419  {
3420  pos = u8g_font_GetEncoding65Pos(u8g->font);
3421  if ( requested_encoding >= 65 && pos > 0 )
3422  {
3423  p+= pos;
3424  start = 65;
3425  }
3426  else
3427  p += U8G_FONT_DATA_STRUCT_SIZE; /* skip font general information */
3428  }
3429 
3430  if ( requested_encoding > end )
3431  {
3432  u8g_FillEmptyGlyphCache(u8g);
3433  return NULL; /* not found */
3434  }
3435 
3436  i = start;
3437  if ( i <= end )
3438  {
3439  for(;;)
3440  {
3441  if ( u8g_pgm_read((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)(p)) == 255 )
3442  {
3443  p += 1;
3444  }
3445  else
3446  {
3447  if ( i == requested_encoding )
3448  {
3449  u8g_CopyGlyphDataToCache(u8g, p);
3450  return p;
3451  }
3452  p += u8g_pgm_read( ((u8g_pgm_uint8_t *)(p)) + 2 ) & mask;
3453  p += data_structure_size;
3454  }
3455  if ( i == end )
3456  break;
3457  i++;
3458  }
3459  }
3460 
3461  u8g_FillEmptyGlyphCache(u8g);
3462 
3463  return NULL;
3464 }
3465 
3466 uint8_t u8g_IsGlyph(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t requested_encoding)
3467 {
3468  if ( u8g_GetGlyph(u8g, requested_encoding) != NULL )
3469  return 1;
3470  return 0;
3471 }
3472 
3473 int8_t u8g_GetGlyphDeltaX(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t requested_encoding)
3474 {
3475  if ( u8g_GetGlyph(u8g, requested_encoding) == NULL )
3476  return 0; /* should never happen, so return something */
3477  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3478 }
3479 
3480 
3481 /*========================================================================*/
3482 /* glyph drawing procedures */
3483 
3484 #ifdef OBSOLETE
3485 /*
3486  Draw a glyph
3487  x,y: left baseline position of the glyph
3488 */
3489 int8_t u8g_DrawGlyphDir(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t dir, uint8_t encoding)
3490 {
3491  u8g_glyph_t g;
3492  uint8_t w, h, i, j;
3493  const u8g_pgm_uint8_t *data;
3494  uint8_t bytes_per_line;
3495  u8g_uint_t ix, iy;
3496 
3497  g = u8g_GetGlyph(u8g, encoding);
3498  if ( g == NULL )
3499  return 0;
3500  w = u8g->glyph_width;
3501  h = u8g->glyph_height;
3502 
3503  bytes_per_line = w;
3504  bytes_per_line += 7;
3505  bytes_per_line /= 8;
3506 
3507  data = u8g_font_GetGlyphDataStart(u8g->font, g);
3508 
3509  switch(dir)
3510  {
3511  case 0:
3512  x += u8g->glyph_x;
3513  y -= u8g->glyph_y;
3514  y--;
3515  //u8g_DrawFrame(u8g, x, y-h+1, w, h);
3516  if ( u8g_IsBBXIntersection(u8g, x, y-h+1, w, h) == 0 )
3517  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3518 
3519  iy = y;
3520  iy -= h;
3521  iy++;
3522 
3523  for( j = 0; j < h; j++ )
3524  {
3525  ix = x;
3526  for( i = 0; i < bytes_per_line; i++ )
3527  {
3528  u8g_Draw8Pixel(u8g, ix, iy, dir, u8g_pgm_read(data));
3529  data++;
3530  ix+=8;
3531  }
3532  iy++;
3533  }
3534  break;
3535  case 1:
3536  x += u8g->glyph_y;
3537  x++;
3538  y += u8g->glyph_x;
3539  //printf("enc %d, dir %d, x %d, y %d, w %d, h %d\n", encoding, dir, x, y, w, h);
3540  //u8g_DrawFrame(u8g, x, y, h, w);
3541  if ( u8g_IsBBXIntersection(u8g, x, y, h, w) == 0 )
3542  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3543 
3544  ix = x;
3545  ix += h;
3546  ix--;
3547  for( j = 0; j < h; j++ )
3548  {
3549  iy = y;
3550  for( i = 0; i < bytes_per_line; i++ )
3551  {
3552  u8g_Draw8Pixel(u8g, ix, iy, dir, u8g_pgm_read(data));
3553  data++;
3554  iy+=8;
3555  }
3556  ix--;
3557  }
3558  break;
3559  case 2:
3560  x -= u8g->glyph_x;
3561  y += u8g->glyph_y;
3562  y++;
3563  if ( u8g_IsBBXIntersection(u8g, x-w-1, y, w, h) == 0 )
3564  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3565 
3566  iy = y;
3567  iy += h;
3568  iy--;
3569  for( j = 0; j < h; j++ )
3570  {
3571  ix = x;
3572  for( i = 0; i < bytes_per_line; i++ )
3573  {
3574  u8g_Draw8Pixel(u8g, ix, iy, dir, u8g_pgm_read(data));
3575  data++;
3576  ix-=8;
3577  }
3578  iy--;
3579  }
3580  break;
3581  case 3:
3582  x -= u8g->glyph_y;
3583  x--;
3584  y -= u8g->glyph_x;
3585 
3586  if ( u8g_IsBBXIntersection(u8g, x-h-1, y-w-1, h, w) == 0 )
3587  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3588 
3589  ix = x;
3590  ix -= h;
3591  ix++;
3592 
3593  for( j = 0; j < h; j++ )
3594  {
3595  iy = y;
3596  for( i = 0; i < bytes_per_line; i++ )
3597  {
3598  u8g_Draw8Pixel(u8g, ix, iy, dir, u8g_pgm_read(data));
3599  data++;
3600  iy-=8;
3601  }
3602  ix++;
3603  }
3604  break;
3605  }
3606  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3607 }
3608 #endif
3609 
3610 int8_t u8g_draw_glyph(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t encoding)
3611 {
3612  const u8g_pgm_uint8_t *data;
3613  uint8_t w, h;
3614  uint8_t i, j;
3615  u8g_uint_t ix, iy;
3616 
3617  {
3618  u8g_glyph_t g = u8g_GetGlyph(u8g, encoding);
3619  if ( g == NULL )
3620  return 0;
3621  data = u8g_font_GetGlyphDataStart(u8g->font, g);
3622  }
3623 
3624  w = u8g->glyph_width;
3625  h = u8g->glyph_height;
3626 
3627  x += u8g->glyph_x;
3628  y -= u8g->glyph_y;
3629  y--;
3630 
3631  if ( u8g_IsBBXIntersection(u8g, x, y-h+1, w, h) == 0 )
3632  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3633 
3634  /* now, w is reused as bytes per line */
3635  w += 7;
3636  w /= 8;
3637 
3638  iy = y;
3639  iy -= h;
3640  iy++;
3641 
3642  for( j = 0; j < h; j++ )
3643  {
3644  ix = x;
3645  for( i = 0; i < w; i++ )
3646  {
3647  u8g_Draw8Pixel(u8g, ix, iy, 0, u8g_pgm_read(data));
3648  data++;
3649  ix+=8;
3650  }
3651  iy++;
3652  }
3653  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3654 }
3655 
3656 int8_t u8g_DrawGlyph(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t encoding)
3657 {
3658  y += u8g->font_calc_vref(u8g);
3659  return u8g_draw_glyph(u8g, x, y, encoding);
3660 }
3661 
3662 int8_t u8g_draw_glyph90(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t encoding)
3663 {
3664  const u8g_pgm_uint8_t *data;
3665  uint8_t w, h;
3666  uint8_t i, j;
3667  u8g_uint_t ix, iy;
3668 
3669  {
3670  u8g_glyph_t g = u8g_GetGlyph(u8g, encoding);
3671  if ( g == NULL )
3672  return 0;
3673  data = u8g_font_GetGlyphDataStart(u8g->font, g);
3674  }
3675 
3676  w = u8g->glyph_width;
3677  h = u8g->glyph_height;
3678 
3679  x += u8g->glyph_y;
3680  x++;
3681  y += u8g->glyph_x;
3682 
3683  if ( u8g_IsBBXIntersection(u8g, x, y, h, w) == 0 )
3684  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3685 
3686  /* now, w is reused as bytes per line */
3687  w += 7;
3688  w /= 8;
3689 
3690  ix = x;
3691  ix += h;
3692  ix--;
3693  for( j = 0; j < h; j++ )
3694  {
3695  iy = y;
3696  for( i = 0; i < w; i++ )
3697  {
3698  u8g_Draw8Pixel(u8g, ix, iy, 1, u8g_pgm_read(data));
3699  data++;
3700  iy+=8;
3701  }
3702  ix--;
3703  }
3704  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3705 }
3706 
3707 int8_t u8g_DrawGlyph90(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t encoding)
3708 {
3709  x -= u8g->font_calc_vref(u8g);
3710  return u8g_draw_glyph90(u8g, x, y, encoding);
3711 }
3712 
3713 
3714 int8_t u8g_draw_glyph180(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t encoding)
3715 {
3716  const u8g_pgm_uint8_t *data;
3717  uint8_t w, h;
3718  uint8_t i, j;
3719  u8g_uint_t ix, iy;
3720 
3721  {
3722  u8g_glyph_t g = u8g_GetGlyph(u8g, encoding);
3723  if ( g == NULL )
3724  return 0;
3725  data = u8g_font_GetGlyphDataStart(u8g->font, g);
3726  }
3727 
3728  w = u8g->glyph_width;
3729  h = u8g->glyph_height;
3730 
3731  x -= u8g->glyph_x;
3732  y += u8g->glyph_y;
3733  y++;
3734 
3735  if ( u8g_IsBBXIntersection(u8g, x-(w-1), y, w, h) == 0 )
3736  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3737 
3738  /* now, w is reused as bytes per line */
3739  w += 7;
3740  w /= 8;
3741 
3742  iy = y;
3743  iy += h;
3744  iy--;
3745  for( j = 0; j < h; j++ )
3746  {
3747  ix = x;
3748  for( i = 0; i < w; i++ )
3749  {
3750  u8g_Draw8Pixel(u8g, ix, iy, 2, u8g_pgm_read(data));
3751  data++;
3752  ix-=8;
3753  }
3754  iy--;
3755  }
3756  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3757 }
3758 
3759 int8_t u8g_DrawGlyph180(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t encoding)
3760 {
3761  y -= u8g->font_calc_vref(u8g);
3762  return u8g_draw_glyph180(u8g, x, y, encoding);
3763 }
3764 
3765 
3766 int8_t u8g_draw_glyph270(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t encoding)
3767 {
3768  const u8g_pgm_uint8_t *data;
3769  uint8_t w, h;
3770  uint8_t i, j;
3771  u8g_uint_t ix, iy;
3772 
3773  {
3774  u8g_glyph_t g = u8g_GetGlyph(u8g, encoding);
3775  if ( g == NULL )
3776  return 0;
3777  data = u8g_font_GetGlyphDataStart(u8g->font, g);
3778  }
3779 
3780  w = u8g->glyph_width;
3781  h = u8g->glyph_height;
3782 
3783  x -= u8g->glyph_y;
3784  x--;
3785  y -= u8g->glyph_x;
3786 
3787  if ( u8g_IsBBXIntersection(u8g, x-(h-1), y-(w-1), h, w) == 0 )
3788  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3789 
3790 
3791  /* now, w is reused as bytes per line */
3792  w += 7;
3793  w /= 8;
3794 
3795  ix = x;
3796  ix -= h;
3797  ix++;
3798 
3799  for( j = 0; j < h; j++ )
3800  {
3801  iy = y;
3802  for( i = 0; i < w; i++ )
3803  {
3804  u8g_Draw8Pixel(u8g, ix, iy, 3, u8g_pgm_read(data));
3805  data++;
3806  iy-=8;
3807  }
3808  ix++;
3809  }
3810  return u8g->glyph_dx;
3811 }
3812 
3813 int8_t u8g_DrawGlyph270(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t encoding)
3814 {
3815  x += u8g->font_calc_vref(u8g);
3816  return u8g_draw_glyph270(u8g, x, y, encoding);
3817 }
3818 
3819 
3820 
3821 #ifdef OBSOLETE
3822 /*
3823  Draw a glyph
3824  x,y: lower left corner of the font bounding box
3825 */
3826 int8_t u8g_DrawGlyphFontBBX(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t dir, uint8_t encoding)
3827 {
3828  /* TODO: apply "dir" */
3829  x -= u8g_GetFontBBXOffX(u8g);
3830  y += u8g_GetFontBBXOffY(u8g);
3831  return u8g_DrawGlyphDir(u8g, x, y, dir, encoding);
3832 }
3833 #endif
3834 
3835 /*========================================================================*/
3836 /* string drawing procedures */
3837 
3838 
3839 u8g_uint_t u8g_DrawStr(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, const char *s)
3840 {
3841  u8g_uint_t t = 0;
3842  int8_t d;
3843 
3844  //u8g_uint_t u8g_GetStrWidth(u8g, s);
3845  //u8g_font_GetFontAscent(u8g->font)-u8g_font_GetFontDescent(u8g->font);
3846 
3847  y += u8g->font_calc_vref(u8g);
3848 
3849  while( *s != '\0' )
3850  {
3851  d = u8g_draw_glyph(u8g, x, y, *s);
3852  x += d;
3853  t += d;
3854  s++;
3855  }
3856  return t;
3857 }
3858 
3859 u8g_uint_t u8g_DrawStr90(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, const char *s)
3860 {
3861  u8g_uint_t t = 0;
3862  int8_t d;
3863 
3864  x -= u8g->font_calc_vref(u8g);
3865 
3866  while( *s != '\0' )
3867  {
3868  d = u8g_draw_glyph90(u8g, x, y, *s);
3869  y += d;
3870  t += d;
3871  s++;
3872  }
3873  return t;
3874 }
3875 
3876 u8g_uint_t u8g_DrawStr180(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, const char *s)
3877 {
3878  u8g_uint_t t = 0;
3879  int8_t d;
3880 
3881  y -= u8g->font_calc_vref(u8g);
3882 
3883  while( *s != '\0' )
3884  {
3885  d = u8g_draw_glyph180(u8g, x, y, *s);
3886  x -= d;
3887  t += d;
3888  s++;
3889  }
3890  return t;
3891 }
3892 
3893 u8g_uint_t u8g_DrawStr270(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, const char *s)
3894 {
3895  u8g_uint_t t = 0;
3896  int8_t d;
3897 
3898  x += u8g->font_calc_vref(u8g);
3899 
3900  while( *s != '\0' )
3901  {
3902  d = u8g_draw_glyph270(u8g, x, y, *s);
3903  y -= d;
3904  t += d;
3905  s++;
3906  }
3907  return t;
3908 }
3909 
3910 u8g_uint_t u8g_DrawStrDir(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t dir, const char *s)
3911 {
3912  switch(dir)
3913  {
3914  case 0:
3915  return u8g_DrawStr(u8g, x, y, s);
3916  case 1:
3917  return u8g_DrawStr90(u8g, x, y, s);
3918  case 2:
3919  return u8g_DrawStr180(u8g, x, y, s);
3920  case 3:
3921  return u8g_DrawStr270(u8g, x, y, s);
3922  }
3923  return 0;
3924 }
3925 
3926 u8g_uint_t u8g_DrawStrP(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, const u8g_pgm_uint8_t *s)
3927 {
3928  u8g_uint_t t = 0;
3929  int8_t d;
3930  uint8_t c;
3931 
3932  y += u8g->font_calc_vref(u8g);
3933 
3934  for(;;)
3935  {
3936  c = u8g_pgm_read(s);
3937  if ( c == '\0' )
3938  break;
3939  d = u8g_draw_glyph(u8g, x, y, c);
3940  x += d;
3941  t += d;
3942  s++;
3943  }
3944  return t;
3945 }
3946 
3947 u8g_uint_t u8g_DrawStr90P(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, const u8g_pgm_uint8_t *s)
3948 {
3949  u8g_uint_t t = 0;
3950  int8_t d;
3951 
3952  x -= u8g->font_calc_vref(u8g);
3953 
3954  while( *s != '\0' )
3955  {
3956  d = u8g_DrawGlyph90(u8g, x, y, u8g_pgm_read(s));
3957  y += d;
3958  t += d;
3959  s++;
3960  }
3961  return t;
3962 }
3963

3974  x -= d;
3975  t += d;
3976  s++;
3977  }

3981 u8g_uint_t u8g_DrawStr270P(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, const u8g_pgm_uint8_t *s)

3990  d = u8g_DrawGlyph270(u8g, x, y, u8g_pgm_read(s));
3991  y -= d;

3994  }
