8710 
8711 #include <string.h>
8712 
8713 void u8g_pb16v1_Init(u8g_pb_t *b, void *buf, u8g_uint_t width) U8G_NOINLINE;
8714 void u8g_pb16v1_set_pixel(u8g_pb_t *b, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t color_index) U8G_NOINLINE;
8715 void u8g_pb16v1_SetPixel(u8g_pb_t *b, const u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t * const arg_pixel) U8G_NOINLINE ;
8716 void u8g_pb16v1_Set8PixelStd(u8g_pb_t *b, u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *arg_pixel) U8G_NOINLINE;
8717 
8718 
8719 void u8g_pb16v1_Clear(u8g_pb_t *b)
8720 {
8721  uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t *)b->buf;
8722  uint8_t *end_ptr = ptr;
8723  end_ptr += b->width*2;
8724  do
8725  {
8726  *ptr++ = 0;
8727  } while( ptr != end_ptr );
8728 }
8729 
8730 /* Obsolete, usually set by the init of the structure */
8731 void u8g_pb16v1_Init(u8g_pb_t *b, void *buf, u8g_uint_t width)
8732 {
8733  b->buf = buf;
8734  b->width = width;
8735  u8g_pb16v1_Clear(b);
8736 }
8737 
8738 void u8g_pb16v1_set_pixel(u8g_pb_t *b, u8g_uint_t x, u8g_uint_t y, uint8_t color_index)
8739 {
8740  register uint8_t mask;
8741  uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)b->buf;
8742 
8743  y -= b->p.page_y0;
8744  if ( y >= 8 )
8745  {
8746  ptr += b->width;
8747  y &= 0x07;
8748  }
8749  mask = 1;
8750  mask <<= y;
8751  ptr += x;
8752  if ( color_index )
8753  {
8754  *ptr |= mask;
8755  }
8756  else
8757  {
8758  mask ^=0xff;
8759  *ptr &= mask;
8760  }
8761 }
8762 
8763 
8764 void u8g_pb16v1_SetPixel(u8g_pb_t *b, const u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t * const arg_pixel)
8765 {
8766  if ( arg_pixel->y < b->p.page_y0 )
8767  return;
8768  if ( arg_pixel->y > b->p.page_y1 )
8769  return;
8770  if ( arg_pixel->x >= b->width )
8771  return;
8772  u8g_pb16v1_set_pixel(b, arg_pixel->x, arg_pixel->y, arg_pixel->color);
8773 }
8774 
8775 void u8g_pb16v1_Set8PixelStd(u8g_pb_t *b, u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *arg_pixel)
8776 {
8777  register uint8_t pixel = arg_pixel->pixel;
8778  do
8779  {
8780  if ( pixel & 128 )
8781  {
8782  u8g_pb16v1_SetPixel(b, arg_pixel);
8783  }
8784  switch( arg_pixel->dir )
8785  {
8786  case 0: arg_pixel->x++; break;
8787  case 1: arg_pixel->y++; break;
8788  case 2: arg_pixel->x--; break;
8789  case 3: arg_pixel->y--; break;
8790  }
8791  pixel <<= 1;
8792  } while( pixel != 0 );
8793 }
8794 
8795 
8796 void u8g_pb16v1_Set8PixelOpt2(u8g_pb_t *b, u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *arg_pixel)
8797 {
8798  register uint8_t pixel = arg_pixel->pixel;
8799  u8g_uint_t dx = 0;
8800  u8g_uint_t dy = 0;
8801 
8802  switch( arg_pixel->dir )
8803  {
8804  case 0: dx++; break;
8805  case 1: dy++; break;
8806  case 2: dx--; break;
8807  case 3: dy--; break;
8808  }
8809 
8810  do
8811  {
8812  if ( pixel & 128 )
8813  u8g_pb16v1_SetPixel(b, arg_pixel);
8814  arg_pixel->x += dx;
8815  arg_pixel->y += dy;
8816  pixel <<= 1;
8817  } while( pixel != 0 );
8818 
8819 }
8820 
8821 uint8_t u8g_dev_pb16v1_base_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
8822 {
8823  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
8824  switch(msg)
8825  {
8826  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_8PIXEL:
8827  if ( u8g_pb_Is8PixelVisible(pb, (u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg) )
8828  u8g_pb16v1_Set8PixelOpt2(pb, (u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg);
8829  break;
8830  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_PIXEL:
8831  u8g_pb16v1_SetPixel(pb, (u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg);
8832  break;
8833  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
8834  break;
8835  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
8836  break;
8837  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_FIRST:
8838  u8g_pb16v1_Clear(pb);
8839  u8g_page_First(&(pb->p));
8840  break;
8841  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
8842  if ( u8g_page_Next(&(pb->p)) == 0 )
8843  return 0;
8844  u8g_pb16v1_Clear(pb);
8845  break;
8846 #ifdef U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION
8847  case U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION:
8848  return u8g_pb_IsIntersection(pb, (u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t *)arg);
8849 #endif
8850  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_PAGE_BOX:
8851  u8g_pb_GetPageBox(pb, (u8g_box_t *)arg);
8852  break;
8853  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_WIDTH:
8854  *((u8g_uint_t *)arg) = pb->width;
8855  break;
8856  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_HEIGHT:
8857  *((u8g_uint_t *)arg) = pb->p.total_height;
8858  break;
8859  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_COLOR_ENTRY:
8860  break;
8861  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_XY_CB:
8862  break;
8863  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_MODE:
8864  return U8G_MODE_BW;
8865  }
8866  return 1;
8867 }
8868 
8869 // ========== u8g_arduino_sw_spi.c ================
8870 
8871 /*
8872 
8873  u8g_arduino_sw_spi.c
8874 
8875  Universal 8bit Graphics Library
8876 
8877  Copyright (c) 2011, olikraus@gmail.com
8878  All rights reserved.
8879 
8880  Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
8881  are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
8882 
8883  * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list
8884  of conditions and the following disclaimer.
8885 
8886  * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this
8887  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other
8888  materials provided with the distribution.
8889 
8890  THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND
8891  CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
8892  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
8893  MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE
8894  DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR
8895  CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
8896  SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT
8897  NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
8898  LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
8899  CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT,
8900  STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE)
8901  ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF
8902  ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
8903 
8904  Update for ATOMIC operation done (01 Jun 2013)
8905  U8G_ATOMIC_OR(ptr, val)
8906  U8G_ATOMIC_AND(ptr, val)
8907  U8G_ATOMIC_START();
8908  U8G_ATOMIC_END();
8909 
8910 
8911 */
8912 
8913 #if defined(ARDUINO)
8914 
8915 /*=========================================================*/
8916 /* Arduino, AVR */
8917 
8918 #if defined(__AVR__)
8919 
8920 //uint8_t u8g_bitData, u8g_bitNotData;
8921 //uint8_t u8g_bitClock, u8g_bitNotClock;
8922 //volatile uint8_t *u8g_outData;
8923 //volatile uint8_t *u8g_outClock;
8924 
8925 /*static void u8g_com_arduino_init_shift_out(uint8_t dataPin, uint8_t clockPin)
8926 {
8927  u8g_outData = portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(dataPin));
8928  u8g_outClock = portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(clockPin));
8929  u8g_bitData = digitalPinToBitMask(dataPin);
8930  u8g_bitClock = digitalPinToBitMask(clockPin);
8931 
8932  u8g_bitNotClock = u8g_bitClock;
8933  u8g_bitNotClock ^= 0x0ff;
8934 
8935  u8g_bitNotData = u8g_bitData;
8936  u8g_bitNotData ^= 0x0ff;
8937 }
8938 
8939 static void u8g_com_arduino_do_shift_out_msb_first(uint8_t val) U8G_NOINLINE;
8940 static void u8g_com_arduino_do_shift_out_msb_first(uint8_t val)
8941 {
8942  uint8_t cnt = 8;
8943  uint8_t bitData = u8g_bitData;
8944  uint8_t bitNotData = u8g_bitNotData;
8945  uint8_t bitClock = u8g_bitClock;
8946  uint8_t bitNotClock = u8g_bitNotClock;
8947  volatile uint8_t *outData = u8g_outData;
8948  volatile uint8_t *outClock = u8g_outClock;
8949  U8G_ATOMIC_START();
8950  do
8951  {
8952  if ( val & 128 )
8953  *outData |= bitData;
8954  else
8955  *outData &= bitNotData;
8956 
8957  *outClock |= bitClock;
8958  val <<= 1;
8959  cnt--;
8960  *outClock &= bitNotClock;
8961  } while( cnt != 0 );
8962  U8G_ATOMIC_END();
8963 }*/
8964 
8965 /*=========================================================*/
8966 /* Arduino, Chipkit */
8967 #elif defined(__18CXX) || defined(__PIC32MX)
8968 
8969 uint16_t dog_bitData, dog_bitNotData;
8970 uint16_t dog_bitClock, dog_bitNotClock;
8971 volatile uint32_t *dog_outData;
8972 volatile uint32_t *dog_outClock;
8973 volatile uint32_t dog_pic32_spi_tmp;
8974 
8975 static void u8g_com_arduino_init_shift_out(uint8_t dataPin, uint8_t clockPin)
8976 {
8977  dog_outData = portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(dataPin));
8978  dog_outClock = portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(clockPin));
8979  dog_bitData = digitalPinToBitMask(dataPin);
8980  dog_bitClock = digitalPinToBitMask(clockPin);
8981 
8982  dog_bitNotClock = dog_bitClock;
8983  dog_bitNotClock ^= 0x0ffff;
8984 
8985  dog_bitNotData = dog_bitData;
8986  dog_bitNotData ^= 0x0ffff;
8987 }
8988 
8989 static void u8g_com_arduino_do_shift_out_msb_first(uint8_t val)
8990 {
8991  uint8_t cnt = 8;
8992  U8G_ATOMIC_START();
8993  do
8994  {
8995  if ( val & 128 )
8996  *dog_outData |= dog_bitData;
8997  else
8998  *dog_outData &= dog_bitNotData;
8999  val <<= 1;
9000  /*
9001  There must be some delay here. However
9002  fetching the adress dog_outClock is enough delay, so
9003  do not place dog_outClock in a local variable. This will
9004  break the procedure
9005  */
9006  *dog_outClock |= dog_bitClock;
9007  cnt--;
9008  *dog_outClock &= dog_bitNotClock;
9009  /*
9010  little additional delay after clk pulse, done by 3x32bit reads
9011  from I/O. Optimized for PIC32 with 80 MHz.
9012  */
9013  dog_pic32_spi_tmp = *dog_outClock;
9014  dog_pic32_spi_tmp = *dog_outClock;
9015  dog_pic32_spi_tmp = *dog_outClock;
9016  } while( cnt != 0 );
9017  U8G_ATOMIC_END();
9018 }
9019 
9020 /*=========================================================*/
9021 /* Arduino Due */
9022 #elif defined(__SAM3X8E__)
9023 
9024 /* Due */
9025 
9026 void u8g_digital_write_sam_high(uint8_t pin)
9027 {
9028  PIO_Set( g_APinDescription[pin].pPort, g_APinDescription[pin].ulPin) ;
9029 }
9030 
9031 void u8g_digital_write_sam_low(uint8_t pin)
9032 {
9033  PIO_Clear( g_APinDescription[pin].pPort, g_APinDescription[pin].ulPin) ;
9034 }
9035 
9036 static uint8_t u8g_sam_data_pin;
9037 static uint8_t u8g_sam_clock_pin;
9038 
9039 /*static void u8g_com_arduino_init_shift_out(uint8_t dataPin, uint8_t clockPin)
9040 {
9041  u8g_sam_data_pin = dataPin;
9042  u8g_sam_clock_pin = clockPin;
9043 }
9044 
9045 static void u8g_com_arduino_do_shift_out_msb_first(uint8_t val)
9046 {
9047  uint8_t i = 8;
9048  do
9049  {
9050  if ( val & 128 )
9051  u8g_digital_write_sam_high(u8g_sam_data_pin);
9052  else
9053  u8g_digital_write_sam_low(u8g_sam_data_pin);
9054  val <<= 1;
9055  //u8g_MicroDelay();
9056  u8g_digital_write_sam_high(u8g_sam_clock_pin);
9057  u8g_MicroDelay();
9058  u8g_digital_write_sam_low(u8g_sam_clock_pin);
9059  u8g_MicroDelay();
9060  i--;
9061  } while( i != 0 );
9062 }
9063 */
9064 
9065 #else
9066 /* empty interface */
9067 
9068 static void u8g_com_arduino_init_shift_out(uint8_t dataPin, uint8_t clockPin)
9069 {
9070 }
9071 
9072 static void u8g_com_arduino_do_shift_out_msb_first(uint8_t val)
9073 {
9074 }
9075 
9076 #endif
9077 
9078 
9079 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_sw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr)
9080 {
9081  switch(msg)
9082  {
9083  case U8G_COM_MSG_INIT:
9084  u8g_com_arduino_assign_pin_output_high(u8g);
9085  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_SCK, LOW);
9086  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_MOSI, LOW);
9087  u8g_com_arduino_init_shift_out(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_MOSI], u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_SCK]);
9088  break;
9089 
9090  case U8G_COM_MSG_STOP:
9091  break;
9092 
9093  case U8G_COM_MSG_RESET:
9094  if ( u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_RESET] != U8G_PIN_NONE )
9095  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_RESET, arg_val);
9096  break;
9097 
9098  case U8G_COM_MSG_CHIP_SELECT:
9099  if ( arg_val == 0 )
9100  {
9101  /* disable */
9102  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS, HIGH);
9103  }
9104  else
9105  {
9106  /* enable */
9107  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_SCK, LOW);
9108  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS, LOW);
9109  /* issue 227 */
9110  u8g_com_arduino_init_shift_out(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_MOSI], u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_SCK]);
9111  }
9112  break;
9113 
9114  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_BYTE:
9115  u8g_com_arduino_do_shift_out_msb_first( arg_val );
9116  //u8g_arduino_sw_spi_shift_out(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_MOSI], u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_SCK], arg_val);
9117  break;
9118 
9119  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ:
9120  {
9121  register uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)arg_ptr;
9122  while( arg_val > 0 )
9123  {
9124  u8g_com_arduino_do_shift_out_msb_first(*ptr++);
9125  // u8g_arduino_sw_spi_shift_out(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_MOSI], u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_SCK], *ptr++);
9126  arg_val--;
9127  }
9128  }
9129  break;
9130 
9131  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ_P:
9132  {
9133  register uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)arg_ptr;
9134  while( arg_val > 0 )
9135  {
9136  u8g_com_arduino_do_shift_out_msb_first( u8g_pgm_read(ptr) );
9137  //u8g_arduino_sw_spi_shift_out(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_MOSI], u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_SCK], u8g_pgm_read(ptr));
9138  ptr++;
9139  arg_val--;
9140  }
9141  }
9142  break;
9143 
9144  case U8G_COM_MSG_ADDRESS: /* define cmd (arg_val = 0) or data mode (arg_val = 1) */
9145  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_A0, arg_val);
9146  break;
9147  }
9148  return 1;
9149 }
9150 
9151 #else /* ARDUINO */
9152 
9153 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_sw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr)
9154 {
9155  return 1;
9156 }
9157 
9158 #endif /* ARDUINO */
9159 
9160 // ================ u8g_dev_ks0108_128x64.c ===================
9161 
9162 /*
9163 
9164  u8g_dev_ks0108_128x64.c
9165 
9166  Universal 8bit Graphics Library
9167 
9168  Copyright (c) 2011, olikraus@gmail.com
9169  All rights reserved.
9170 
9171  Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
9172  are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
9173 
9174  * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list
9175  of conditions and the following disclaimer.
9176 
9177  * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this
9178  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other
9179  materials provided with the distribution.
9180 
9181  THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND
9182  CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
9183  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
9184  MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE
9185  DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR
9186  CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
9187  SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT
9188  NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
9189  LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
9190  CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT,
9191  STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE)
9192  ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF
9193  ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
9194 
9195 
9196  ADDRESS = 0 (Command Mode)
9197  0x03f Display On
9198  0x0c0 Start Display at line 0
9199  0x040 | y write to y address (y:0..63)
9200  0x0b8 | x write to page [0..7]
9201 
9202 
9203  u8g_Init8Bit(u8g, dev, d0, d1, d2, d3, d4, d5, d6, d7, en, cs1, cs2, di, rw, reset)
9204  u8g_Init8Bit(u8g, dev, 8, 9, 10, 11, 4, 5, 6, 7, 18, 14, 15, 17, 16, U8G_PIN_NONE)
9205 
9206 */
9207 
9208 #define WIDTH 128
9209 #define HEIGHT 64
9210 #define PAGE_HEIGHT 8
9211 
9212 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_ks0108_128x64_init_seq[] PROGMEM = {
9213  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
9214  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
9215  U8G_ESC_RST(1), /* do reset low pulse with (1*16)+2 milliseconds */
9216  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip 1 */
9217  0x03f, /* display on */
9218  0x0c0, /* start at line 0 */
9219  U8G_ESC_DLY(20), /* delay 20 ms */
9220  U8G_ESC_CS(2), /* enable chip 2 */
9221  0x03f, /* display on */
9222  0x0c0, /* start at line 0 */
9223  U8G_ESC_DLY(20), /* delay 20 ms */
9224  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable all chips */
9225  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
9226 };
9227 
9228 
9229 uint8_t u8g_dev_ks0108_128x64_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
9230 {
9231 
9232  switch(msg)
9233  {
9234  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
9235  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_NONE);
9236  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_ks0108_128x64_init_seq);
9237  break;
9238  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
9239  break;
9240  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
9241  {
9242  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
9243 
9244  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 0); /* command mode */
9245  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 2);
9246  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b8 | pb->p.page); /* select current page (KS0108b) */
9247  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x040 ); /* set address 0 */
9248  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
9249  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, 64, (uint8_t*)pb->buf);
9250  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
9251 
9252  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 0); /* command mode */
9253  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 1);
9254  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b8 | pb->p.page); /* select current page (KS0108b) */
9255  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x040 ); /* set address 0 */
9256  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
9257  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, 64, 64+(uint8_t *)pb->buf);
9258  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
9259 
9260  }
9261  break;
9262  }
9263  return u8g_dev_pb8v1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
9264 }
9265 
9266 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_ks0108_128x64, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_ks0108_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_PARALLEL);
9267 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_ks0108_128x64_fast, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_ks0108_128x64_fn, U8G_COM_FAST_PARALLEL);
9268 
9269 // ================= 8g_com_arduino_parallel.c ==================
9270 
9271 /*
9272 
9273  u8g_com_arduino_parallel.c
9274 
9275  Universal 8bit Graphics Library
9276 
9277  Copyright (c) 2011, olikraus@gmail.com
9278  All rights reserved.
9279 
9280  Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
9281  are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
9282 
9283  * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list
9284  of conditions and the following disclaimer.
9285 
9286  * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this
9287  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other
9288  materials provided with the distribution.
9289 
9290  THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND
9291  CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
9292  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
9293  MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE
9294  DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR
9295  CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
9296  SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT
9297  NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
9298  LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
9299  CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT,
9300  STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE)
9301  ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF
9302  ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
9303 
9304 
9305  PIN_D0 8
9306  PIN_D1 9
9307  PIN_D2 10
9308  PIN_D3 11
9309  PIN_D4 4
9310  PIN_D5 5
9311  PIN_D6 6
9312  PIN_D7 7
9313 
9314  PIN_CS1 14
9315  PIN_CS2 15
9316  PIN_RW 16
9317  PIN_DI 17
9318  PIN_EN 18
9319 
9320  u8g_Init8Bit(u8g, dev, d0, d1, d2, d3, d4, d5, d6, d7, en, cs1, cs2, di, rw, reset)
9321  u8g_Init8Bit(u8g, dev, 8, 9, 10, 11, 4, 5, 6, 7, 18, 14, 15, 17, 16, U8G_PIN_NONE)
9322 
9323 */
9324 
9325 #if defined(ARDUINO)
9326 
9327 
9328 void u8g_com_arduino_parallel_write(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t val)
9329 {
9330  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_D0, val&1);
9331  val >>= 1;
9332  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_D1, val&1);
9333  val >>= 1;
9334  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_D2, val&1);
9335  val >>= 1;
9336  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_D3, val&1);
9337  val >>= 1;
9338  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_D4, val&1);
9339  val >>= 1;
9340  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_D5, val&1);
9341  val >>= 1;
9342  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_D6, val&1);
9343  val >>= 1;
9344  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_D7, val&1);
9345 
9346  /* EN cycle time must be 1 micro second, digitalWrite is slow enough to do this */
9347  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_EN, HIGH);
9348  u8g_MicroDelay(); /* delay by 1000ns, reference: ST7920: 140ns, SBN1661: 100ns */
9349  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_EN, LOW);
9350  u8g_10MicroDelay(); /* ST7920 commands: 72us */
9351 }
9352 
9353 
9354 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_parallel_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr)
9355 {
9356  switch(msg)
9357  {
9358  case U8G_COM_MSG_INIT:
9359  /* setup the RW pin as output and force it to low */
9360  if ( u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_RW] != U8G_PIN_NONE )
9361  {
9362  pinMode(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_RW], OUTPUT);
9363  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_RW, LOW);
9364  }
9365  /* set all pins (except RW pin) */
9366  u8g_com_arduino_assign_pin_output_high(u8g);
9367  break;
9368  case U8G_COM_MSG_STOP:
9369  break;
9370  case U8G_COM_MSG_CHIP_SELECT:
9371  if ( arg_val == 0 )
9372  {
9373  /* disable */
9374  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS1, HIGH);
9375  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS2, HIGH);
9376  }
9377  else if ( arg_val == 1 )
9378  {
9379  /* enable */
9380  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS1, LOW);
9381  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS2, HIGH);
9382  }
9383  else if ( arg_val == 2 )
9384  {
9385  /* enable */
9386  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS1, HIGH);
9387  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS2, LOW);
9388  }
9389  else
9390  {
9391  /* enable */
9392  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS1, LOW);
9393  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS2, LOW);
9394  }
9395  break;
9396  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_BYTE:
9397  u8g_com_arduino_parallel_write(u8g, arg_val);
9398  break;
9399  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ:
9400  {
9401  register uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)arg_ptr;
9402  while( arg_val > 0 )
9403  {
9404  u8g_com_arduino_parallel_write(u8g, *ptr++);
9405  arg_val--;
9406  }
9407  }
9408  break;
9409  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ_P:
9410  {
9411  register uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)arg_ptr;
9412  while( arg_val > 0 )
9413  {
9414  u8g_com_arduino_parallel_write(u8g, u8g_pgm_read(ptr));
9415  ptr++;
9416  arg_val--;
9417  }
9418  }
9419  break;
9420  case U8G_COM_MSG_ADDRESS: /* define cmd (arg_val = 0) or data mode (arg_val = 1) */
9421  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_DI, arg_val);
9422  break;
9423  case U8G_COM_MSG_RESET:
9424  if ( u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_RESET] != U8G_PIN_NONE )
9425  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_RESET, arg_val);
9426  break;
9427 
9428  }
9429  return 1;
9430 }
9431 
9432 #else
9433 
9434 
9435 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_parallel_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr)
9436 {
9437  return 1;
9438 }
9439 
9440 #endif /* ARDUINO */
9441 
9442 
9443 // =============== u8g_arduino_fast_parallel.c ================
9444 /*
9445 
9446  u8g_arduino_fast_parallel.c
9447 
9448  Universal 8bit Graphics Library
9449 
9450  Copyright (c) 2011, olikraus@gmail.com
9451  All rights reserved.
9452 
9453  Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
9454  are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
9455 
9456  * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list
9457  of conditions and the following disclaimer.
9458 
9459  * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this
9460  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other
9461  materials provided with the distribution.
9462 
9463  THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND
9464  CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
9465  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
9466  MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE
9467  DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR
9468  CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
9469  SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT
9470  NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
9471  LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
9472  CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT,
9473  STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE)
9474  ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF
9475  ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
9476 
9477  PIN_D0 8
9478  PIN_D1 9
9479  PIN_D2 10
9480  PIN_D3 11
9481  PIN_D4 4
9482  PIN_D5 5
9483  PIN_D6 6
9484  PIN_D7 7
9485 
9486  PIN_CS1 14
9487  PIN_CS2 15
9488  PIN_RW 16
9489  PIN_DI 17
9490  PIN_EN 18
9491 
9492  u8g_Init8Bit(u8g, dev, d0, d1, d2, d3, d4, d5, d6, d7, en, cs1, cs2, di, rw, reset)
9493  u8g_Init8Bit(u8g, dev, 8, 9, 10, 11, 4, 5, 6, 7, 18, 14, 15, 17, 16, U8G_PIN_NONE)
9494 
9495  Update for ATOMIC operation done (01 Jun 2013)
9496  U8G_ATOMIC_OR(ptr, val)
9497  U8G_ATOMIC_AND(ptr, val)
9498  U8G_ATOMIC_START();
9499  U8G_ATOMIC_END();
9500 
9501 */
9502 
9503 #if defined(ARDUINO)
9504 
9505 #define PIN_D0 UI_DISPLAY_D0_PIN
9506 #define PIN_D1 UI_DISPLAY_D1_PIN
9507 #define PIN_D2 UI_DISPLAY_D2_PIN
9508 #define PIN_D3 UI_DISPLAY_D3_PIN
9509 #define PIN_D4 UI_DISPLAY_D4_PIN
9510 #define PIN_D5 UI_DISPLAY_D5_PIN
9511 #define PIN_D6 UI_DISPLAY_D6_PIN
9512 #define PIN_D7 UI_DISPLAY_D7_PIN
9513 
9514 #define PIN_CS1 UI_DISPLAY_CS1
9515 #define PIN_CS2 UI_DISPLAY_CS2
9516 #define PIN_RW UI_DISPLAY_RW_PIN
9517 #define PIN_DI UI_DISPLAY_DI
9518 #define PIN_EN UI_DISPLAY_ENABLE_PIN
9519 
9520 //#define PIN_RESET
9521 
9522 
9523 #if defined(__PIC32MX)
9524 /* CHIPKIT PIC32 */
9525 static volatile uint32_t *u8g_data_port[8];
9526 static uint32_t u8g_data_mask[8];
9527 #else
9528 static volatile uint8_t *u8g_data_port[8];
9529 static uint8_t u8g_data_mask[8];
9530 #endif
9531 
9532 
9533 
9534 static void u8g_com_arduino_fast_parallel_init(u8g_t *u8g)
9535 {
9536  u8g_data_port[0] = (volatile uint8_t*)portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D0]));// added conversion for due to compile
9537  u8g_data_mask[0] = digitalPinToBitMask(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D0]);
9538  u8g_data_port[1] = (volatile uint8_t*)portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D1]));// added conversion for due to compile
9539  u8g_data_mask[1] = digitalPinToBitMask(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D1]);
9540  u8g_data_port[2] = (volatile uint8_t*)portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D2]));// added conversion for due to compile
9541  u8g_data_mask[2] = digitalPinToBitMask(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D2]);
9542  u8g_data_port[3] = (volatile uint8_t*)portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D3]));// added conversion for due to compile
9543  u8g_data_mask[3] = digitalPinToBitMask(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D3]);
9544 
9545  u8g_data_port[4] = (volatile uint8_t*)portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D4])); // added conversion for due to compile
9546  u8g_data_mask[4] = digitalPinToBitMask(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D4]);
9547  u8g_data_port[5] = (volatile uint8_t*)portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D5]));// added conversion for due to compile
9548  u8g_data_mask[5] = digitalPinToBitMask(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D5]);
9549  u8g_data_port[6] = (volatile uint8_t*)portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D6]));// added conversion for due to compile
9550  u8g_data_mask[6] = digitalPinToBitMask(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D6]);
9551  u8g_data_port[7] = (volatile uint8_t*)portOutputRegister(digitalPinToPort(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D7]));// added conversion for due to compile
9552  u8g_data_mask[7] = digitalPinToBitMask(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_D7]);
9553 }
9554 
9555 /* atomic protection must be done by calling function */
9556 static void u8g_com_arduino_fast_write_data_pin(uint8_t pin, uint8_t val)
9557 {
9558  if ( val != 0 )
9559  *u8g_data_port[pin] |= u8g_data_mask[pin];
9560  else
9561  *u8g_data_port[pin] &= ~u8g_data_mask[pin];
9562 }
9563 
9564 
9565 void u8g_com_arduino_fast_parallel_write(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t val)
9566 {
9567  U8G_ATOMIC_START();
9568  u8g_com_arduino_fast_write_data_pin( 0, val&1 );
9569  val >>= 1;
9570  u8g_com_arduino_fast_write_data_pin( 1, val&1 );
9571  val >>= 1;
9572  u8g_com_arduino_fast_write_data_pin( 2, val&1 );
9573  val >>= 1;
9574  u8g_com_arduino_fast_write_data_pin( 3, val&1 );
9575  val >>= 1;
9576 
9577  u8g_com_arduino_fast_write_data_pin( 4, val&1 );
9578  val >>= 1;
9579  u8g_com_arduino_fast_write_data_pin( 5, val&1 );
9580  val >>= 1;
9581  u8g_com_arduino_fast_write_data_pin( 6, val&1 );
9582  val >>= 1;
9583  u8g_com_arduino_fast_write_data_pin( 7, val&1 );
9584  val >>= 1;
9585  U8G_ATOMIC_END();
9586 
9587  /* EN cycle time must be 1 micro second */
9588  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_EN, HIGH);
9589  u8g_MicroDelay(); /* delay by 1000ns, reference: ST7920: 140ns, SBN1661: 100ns */
9590  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_EN, LOW);
9591  u8g_10MicroDelay(); /* ST7920 commands: 72us */
9592  u8g_10MicroDelay(); /* ST7920 commands: 72us */
9593 }
9594 
9595 
9596 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_fast_parallel_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr)
9597 {
9598  switch(msg)
9599  {
9600  case U8G_COM_MSG_INIT:
9601  u8g_com_arduino_fast_parallel_init(u8g);
9602  /* setup the RW pin as output and force it to low */
9603  if ( u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_RW] != U8G_PIN_NONE )
9604  {
9605  pinMode(u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_RW], OUTPUT);
9606  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_RW, LOW);
9607  }
9608  /* set all pins (except RW pin) */
9609  u8g_com_arduino_assign_pin_output_high(u8g);
9610  break;
9611  case U8G_COM_MSG_STOP:
9612  break;
9613 
9614  case U8G_COM_MSG_CHIP_SELECT:
9615  if ( arg_val == 0 )
9616  {
9617  /* disable */
9618  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS1, HIGH);
9619  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS2, HIGH);
9620  }
9621  else if ( arg_val == 1 )
9622  {
9623  /* enable */
9624  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS1, LOW);
9625  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS2, HIGH);
9626  }
9627  else if ( arg_val == 2 )
9628  {
9629  /* enable */
9630  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS1, HIGH);
9631  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS2, LOW);
9632  }
9633  else
9634  {
9635  /* enable */
9636  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS1, LOW);
9637  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS2, LOW);
9638  }
9639  break;
9640  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_BYTE:
9641  u8g_com_arduino_fast_parallel_write(u8g, arg_val);
9642  break;
9643  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ:
9644  {
9645  register uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)arg_ptr;
9646  while( arg_val > 0 )
9647  {
9648  u8g_com_arduino_fast_parallel_write(u8g, *ptr++);
9649  arg_val--;
9650  }
9651  }
9652  break;
9653  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ_P:
9654  {
9655  register uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)arg_ptr;
9656  while( arg_val > 0 )
9657  {
9658  u8g_com_arduino_fast_parallel_write(u8g, u8g_pgm_read(ptr));
9659  ptr++;
9660  arg_val--;
9661  }
9662  }
9663  break;
9664  case U8G_COM_MSG_ADDRESS: /* define cmd (arg_val = 0) or data mode (arg_val = 1) */
9665  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_DI, arg_val);
9666  break;
9667  case U8G_COM_MSG_RESET:
9668  if ( u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_RESET] != U8G_PIN_NONE )
9669  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_RESET, arg_val);
9670  break;
9671 
9672  }
9673  return 1;
9674 }
9675 
9676 #else
9677 
9678 
9679 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_fast_parallel_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr)
9680 {
9681  return 1;
9682 }
9683 
9684 
9685 #endif /* ARDUINO */
9686 
9687 
9688 /*
9689 
9690  u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864.c
9691 
9692  Support for the NHD-C12864A1Z-FSB-FBW (Newhaven Display)
9693 
9694  Universal 8bit Graphics Library
9695 
9696  Copyright (c) 2012, olikraus@gmail.com
9697  All rights reserved.
9698 
9699  Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
9700  are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
9701 
9702  * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list
9703  of conditions and the following disclaimer.
9704 
9705  * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this
9706  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other
9707  materials provided with the distribution.
9708 
9709  THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND
9710  CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
9711  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
9712  MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE
9713  DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR
9714  CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
9715  SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT
9716  NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
9717  LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
9718  CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT,
9719  STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE)
9720  ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF
9721  ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
9722 
9723 
9724 */
9725 
9726 #define WIDTH 128
9727 #define HEIGHT 64
9728 #define PAGE_HEIGHT 8
9729 
9730 const uint8_t u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_init_seq[] PROGMEM = {
9731  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
9732  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
9733  U8G_ESC_RST(10), /* do reset low pulse with (10*16)+2 milliseconds */
9734  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
9735 
9736  0x040, /* set display start line */
9737  0x0a1, /* ADC set to reverse */
9738  0x0c0, /* common output mode: set scan direction normal operation */
9739  0x0a6, /* display normal, bit val 0: LCD pixel off. */
9740  0x0a2, /* LCD bias 1/9 */
9741  0x02f, /* all power control circuits on */
9742  0x0f8, /* set booster ratio to */
9743  0x000, /* 4x */
9744  0x027, /* set V0 voltage resistor ratio to large */
9745  0x081, /* set contrast */
9746  0x008, /* contrast: 0x008 is a good value for NHD C12864, Nov 2012: User reports that 0x1a is much better */
9747  0x0ac, /* indicator */
9748  0x000, /* disable */
9749  0x0af, /* display on */
9750 
9751  U8G_ESC_DLY(100), /* delay 100 ms */
9752  0x0a5, /* display all points, ST7565 */
9753  U8G_ESC_DLY(100), /* delay 100 ms */
9754  U8G_ESC_DLY(100), /* delay 100 ms */
9755  0x0a4, /* normal display */
9756  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
9757  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
9758 };
9759 
9760 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_data_start[] PROGMEM = {
9761  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
9762  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
9763  0x010, /* set upper 4 bit of the col adr to 0 */
9764  0x004, /* set lower 4 bit of the col adr to 4 (NHD C12864) */
9765  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
9766 };
9767 
9768 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_st7565_c12864_sleep_on[] PROGMEM = {
9769  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
9770  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
9771  0x0ac, /* static indicator off */
9772  0x000, /* indicator register set (not sure if this is required) */
9773  0x0ae, /* display off */
9774  0x0a5, /* all points on */
9775  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip, bugfix 12 nov 2014 */
9776  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
9777 };
9778 
9779 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_st7565_c12864_sleep_off[] PROGMEM = {
9780  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
9781  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
9782  0x0a4, /* all points off */
9783  0x0af, /* display on */
9784  U8G_ESC_DLY(50), /* delay 50 ms */
9785  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip, bugfix 12 nov 2014 */
9786  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
9787 };
9788 
9789 uint8_t u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
9790 {
9791  switch(msg)
9792  {
9793  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
9794 #if defined(__SAM3X8E__)
9795  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_400NS);
9796 #else
9797  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_400NS);
9798 #endif
9799  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_init_seq);
9800  break;
9801  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
9802  break;
9803  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
9804  {
9805  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
9806  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_data_start);
9807  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | pb->p.page); /* select current page (ST7565R) */
9808  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
9809  if ( u8g_pb_WriteBuffer(pb, u8g, dev) == 0 )
9810  return 0;
9811  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
9812  }
9813  break;
9814  case U8G_DEV_MSG_CONTRAST:
9815  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 1);
9816  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 0); /* instruction mode */
9817  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x081);
9818  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, (*(uint8_t *)arg) >> 2);
9819  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
9820  return 1;
9821  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_ON:
9822  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_st7565_c12864_sleep_on);
9823  return 1;
9824  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_OFF:
9825  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_st7565_c12864_sleep_off);
9826  return 1;
9827  }
9828  return u8g_dev_pb8v1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
9829 }
9830 
9831 uint8_t u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_2x_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
9832 {
9833  switch(msg)
9834  {
9835  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
9836  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_400NS);
9837  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_init_seq);
9838  break;
9839  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
9840  break;
9841  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
9842  {
9843  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
9844 
9845  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_data_start);
9846  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | (2*pb->p.page)); /* select current page (ST7565R) */
9847  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
9848  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, pb->width, (uint8_t*)pb->buf);
9849  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
9850 
9851  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_data_start);
9852  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | (2*pb->p.page+1)); /* select current page (ST7565R) */
9853  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
9854  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, pb->width, (uint8_t *)(pb->buf)+pb->width);
9855  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
9856  }
9857  break;
9858  case U8G_DEV_MSG_CONTRAST:
9859  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 1);
9860  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 0); /* instruction mode */
9861  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x081);
9862  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, (*(uint8_t *)arg) >> 2);
9863  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
9864  return 1;
9865  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_ON:
9866  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_st7565_c12864_sleep_on);
9867  return 1;
9868  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SLEEP_OFF:
9869  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_st7565_c12864_sleep_off);
9870  return 1;
9871  }
9872  return u8g_dev_pb16v1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
9873 }
9874 
9875 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_sw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_fn, U8G_COM_SW_SPI);
9876 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_hw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_fn, U8G_COM_HW_SPI);
9877 
9878 
9879 uint8_t u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_2x_buf[WIDTH*2] U8G_NOCOMMON ;
9880 u8g_pb_t u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_2x_pb = { {16, HEIGHT, 0, 0, 0}, WIDTH, u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_2x_buf};
9881 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_2x_sw_spi = { u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_2x_fn, &u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_2x_pb, U8G_COM_SW_SPI };
9882 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_2x_hw_spi = { u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_2x_fn, &u8g_dev_st7565_nhd_c12864_2x_pb, U8G_COM_HW_SPI };
9883 
9884 /*
9885 
9886  u8g_com_arduino_hw_spi.c
9887 
9888  Universal 8bit Graphics Library
9889 
9890  Copyright (c) 2011, olikraus@gmail.com
9891  All rights reserved.
9892 
9893  Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
9894  are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
9895 
9896  * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list
9897  of conditions and the following disclaimer.
9898 
9899  * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this
9900  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other
9901  materials provided with the distribution.
9902 
9903  THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND
9904  CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
9905  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
9906  MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE
9907  DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR
9908  CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
9909  SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT
9910  NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
9911  LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
9912  CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT,
9913  STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE)
9914  ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF
9915  ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
9916 
9917  SPI Clock Cycle Type
9918 
9919  SSD1351 50ns 20 MHz
9920  SSD1322 300ns 3.3 MHz
9921  SSD1327 300ns
9922  SSD1306 300ns
9923  ST7565 400ns 2.5 MHz
9924  ST7920 400ns
9925 
9926  Arduino DUE
9927 
9928  PA25 MISO
9929  PA26 MOSI 75
9930  PA27 SCLK 76
9931 
9932 
9933 typedef struct {
9934  WoReg SPI_CR; (Spi Offset: 0x00) Control Register
9935  RwReg SPI_MR; (Spi Offset: 0x04) Mode Register
9936  RoReg SPI_RDR; (Spi Offset: 0x08) Receive Data Register
9937  WoReg SPI_TDR; (Spi Offset: 0x0C) Transmit Data Register
9938  RoReg SPI_SR; (Spi Offset: 0x10) Status Register
9939  WoReg SPI_IER; (Spi Offset: 0x14) Interrupt Enable Register
9940  WoReg SPI_IDR; (Spi Offset: 0x18) Interrupt Disable Register
9941  RoReg SPI_IMR; (Spi Offset: 0x1C) Interrupt Mask Register
9942  RoReg Reserved1[4];
9943  RwReg SPI_CSR[4]; (Spi Offset: 0x30) Chip Select Register
9944  RoReg Reserved2[41];
9945  RwReg SPI_WPMR; (Spi Offset: 0xE4) Write Protection Control Register
9946  RoReg SPI_WPSR; (Spi Offset: 0xE8) Write Protection Status Register
9947 } Spi;
9948 
9949  Power Management Controller (PMC)
9950  arduino-1.5.2/hardware/arduino/sam/system/CMSIS/Device/ATMEL/sam3xa/include/instance/instance_pmc.h
9951  - enable PIO
9952 
9953  REG_PMC_PCER0 = 1UL << ID_PIOA
9954  - enable SPI
9955  REG_PMC_PCER0 = 1UL << ID_SPI0
9956 
9957 
9958  - enable PIOA and SPI0
9959  REG_PMC_PCER0 = (1UL << ID_PIOA) | (1UL << ID_SPI0);
9960 
9961  Parallel Input/Output Controller (PIO)
9962  arduino-1.5.2/hardware/arduino/sam/system/CMSIS/Device/ATMEL/sam3xa/include/instance/instance_pioa.h
9963  - enable special function of the pin: disable PIO on A26 and A27:
9964  REG_PIOA_PDR = 0x0c000000
9965  PIOA->PIO_PDR = 0x0c000000
9966 
9967  SPI
9968  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SPIDIS
9969  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SWRST ;
9970  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SWRST ;
9971  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SPIEN
9972 
9973  Bit 0: Master Mode = 1 (active)
9974  Bit 1: Peripheral Select = 0 (fixed)
9975  Bit 2: Chip Select Decode Mode = 1 (4 to 16)
9976  Bit 4: Mode Fault Detection = 1 (disabled)
9977  Bit 5: Wait Data Read = 0 (disabled)
9978  Bit 7: Loop Back Mode = 0 (disabled)
9979  Bit 16-19: Peripheral Chip Select = 0 (chip select 0)
9980  SPI0->SPI_MR = SPI_MR_MSTR | SPI_MR_PCSDEC | SPI_MR_MODFDIS
9981 
9982  Bit 0: Clock Polarity = 0
9983  Bit 1: Clock Phase = 0
9984  Bit 4-7: Bits = 0 (8 Bit)
9985  Bit 8-15: SCBR = 1
9986  SPI0->SPI_CSR[0] = SPI_CSR_SCBR(x) Serial Baud Rate
9987  SCBR / 84000000 > 50 / 1000000000
9988  SCBR / 84 > 5 / 100
9989  SCBR > 50 *84 / 1000 --> SCBR=5
9990  SCBR > 300*84 / 1000 --> SCBR=26
9991  SCBR > 400*84 / 1000 --> SCBR=34
9992 
9993  Arduino Due test code:
9994  REG_PMC_PCER0 = (1UL << ID_PIOA) | (1UL << ID_SPI0);
9995  REG_PIOA_PDR = 0x0c000000;
9996  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SPIDIS;
9997  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SWRST;
9998  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SWRST;
9999  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SPIEN;
10000  SPI0->SPI_MR = SPI_MR_MSTR | SPI_MR_PCSDEC | SPI_MR_MODFDIS;
10001  SPI0->SPI_CSR[0] = SPI_CSR_SCBR(30);
10002 
10003  for(;;)
10004  {
10005  while( (SPI0->SPI_SR & SPI_SR_TDRE) == 0 )
10006  ;
10007  SPI0->SPI_TDR = 0x050;
10008  }
10009 
10010 */
10011 
10012 #if defined(ARDUINO)
10013 
10014 #if defined(__AVR__)
10015 #define U8G_ARDUINO_ATMEGA_HW_SPI
10016 /* remove the definition for attiny */
10017 #if __AVR_ARCH__ == 2
10018 #undef U8G_ARDUINO_ATMEGA_HW_SPI
10019 #endif
10020 #if __AVR_ARCH__ == 25
10021 #undef U8G_ARDUINO_ATMEGA_HW_SPI
10022 #endif
10023 #endif
10024 
10025 #if defined(U8G_ARDUINO_ATMEGA_HW_SPI)
10026 
10027 //#include <avr/interrupt.h>
10028 //#include <avr/io.h>
10029 
10030 #if ARDUINO < 100
10031 
10032 /* fixed pins */
10033 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega644P__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega1284P__) // Sanguino.cc board
10034 #define PIN_SCK 7
10035 #define PIN_MISO 6
10036 #define PIN_MOSI 5
10037 #define PIN_CS 4
10038 #else // Arduino Board
10039 #define PIN_SCK 13
10040 #define PIN_MISO 12
10041 #define PIN_MOSI 11
10042 #define PIN_CS 10
10043 #endif // (__AVR_ATmega644P__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega1284P__)
10044 
10045 #else
10046 
10047 /* use Arduino pin definitions */
10048 #define PIN_SCK SCK
10049 #define PIN_MISO MISO_PIN
10050 #define PIN_MOSI MOSI_PIN
10051 #define PIN_CS SS
10052 
10053 #endif
10054 
10055 
10056 
10057 //static uint8_t u8g_spi_out(uint8_t data) U8G_NOINLINE;
10058 static uint8_t u8g_spi_out(uint8_t data)
10059 {
10060  /* unsigned char x = 100; */
10061  /* send data */
10062  SPDR = data;
10063  /* wait for transmission */
10064  while (!(SPSR & (1<<SPIF)))
10065  ;
10066  /* clear the SPIF flag by reading SPDR */
10067  return SPDR;
10068 }
10069 
10070 
10071 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_hw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr)
10072 {
10073  switch(msg)
10074  {
10075  case U8G_COM_MSG_STOP:
10076  break;
10077 
10078  case U8G_COM_MSG_INIT:
10079  u8g_com_arduino_assign_pin_output_high(u8g);
10080  pinMode(PIN_SCK, OUTPUT);
10081  digitalWrite(PIN_SCK, LOW);
10082  pinMode(PIN_MOSI, OUTPUT);
10083  digitalWrite(PIN_MOSI, LOW);
10084  /* pinMode(PIN_MISO, INPUT); */
10085 
10086  pinMode(PIN_CS, OUTPUT); /* system chip select for the atmega board */
10087  digitalWrite(PIN_CS, HIGH);
10088 
10089 
10090 
10091  /*
10092  SPR1 SPR0
10093  0 0 fclk/4
10094  0 1 fclk/16
10095  1 0 fclk/64
10096  1 1 fclk/128
10097  */
10098  SPCR = 0;
10099  SPCR = (1<<SPE) | (1<<MSTR)|(0<<SPR1)|(0<<SPR0)|(0<<CPOL)|(0<<CPHA);
10100 #ifdef U8G_HW_SPI_2X
10101  SPSR = (1 << SPI2X); /* double speed, issue 89 */
10102 #else
10103  if ( arg_val <= U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_50NS )
10104  {
10105  SPSR = (1 << SPI2X); /* double speed, issue 89 */
10106  }
10107 #endif
10108 
10109 
10110  break;
10111 
10112  case U8G_COM_MSG_ADDRESS: /* define cmd (arg_val = 0) or data mode (arg_val = 1) */
10113  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_A0, arg_val);
10114  break;
10115 
10116  case U8G_COM_MSG_CHIP_SELECT:
10117  if ( arg_val == 0 )
10118  {
10119  /* disable */
10120  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS, HIGH);
10121  }
10122  else
10123  {
10124  /* enable */
10125  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_SCK, LOW);
10126  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS, LOW);
10127  }
10128  break;
10129 
10130  case U8G_COM_MSG_RESET:
10131  if ( u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_RESET] != U8G_PIN_NONE )
10132  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_RESET, arg_val);
10133  break;
10134 
10135  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_BYTE:
10136  u8g_spi_out(arg_val);
10137  break;
10138 
10139  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ:
10140  {
10141  register uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)arg_ptr;
10142  while( arg_val > 0 )
10143  {
10144  u8g_spi_out(*ptr++);
10145  arg_val--;
10146  }
10147  }
10148  break;
10149  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ_P:
10150  {
10151  register uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)arg_ptr;
10152  while( arg_val > 0 )
10153  {
10154  u8g_spi_out(u8g_pgm_read(ptr));
10155  ptr++;
10156  arg_val--;
10157  }
10158  }
10159  break;
10160  }
10161  return 1;
10162 }
10163 
10164 /* #elif defined(__18CXX) || defined(__PIC32MX) */
10165 
10166 #elif defined(__SAM3X8E__) // Arduino Due, maybe we should better check for __SAM3X8E__
10167 
10168 /* use Arduino pin definitions */
10169 #define PIN_SCK SCK
10170 #define PIN_MISO MISO
10171 #define PIN_MOSI MOSI
10172 #define PIN_CS SS
10173 
10174 
10175 static uint8_t u8g_spi_out(uint8_t data)
10176 {
10177  /* wait until tx register is empty */
10178  while( (SPI0->SPI_SR & SPI_SR_TDRE) == 0 )
10179  ;
10180  /* send data */
10181  SPI0->SPI_TDR = (uint32_t)data;
10182  return data;
10183 }
10184 
10185 
10186 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_hw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr)
10187 {
10188  switch(msg)
10189  {
10190  case U8G_COM_MSG_STOP:
10191  break;
10192 
10193  case U8G_COM_MSG_INIT:
10194  u8g_com_arduino_assign_pin_output_high(u8g);
10195  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS, HIGH);
10196 
10197  /* Arduino Due specific code */
10198 
10199  /* enable PIOA and SPI0 */
10200  REG_PMC_PCER0 = (1UL << ID_PIOA) | (1UL << ID_SPI0);
10201 
10202  /* disable PIO on A26 and A27 */
10203  REG_PIOA_PDR = 0x0c000000;
10204 
10205  /* reset SPI0 (from sam lib) */
10206  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SPIDIS;
10207  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SWRST;
10208  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SWRST;
10209  SPI0->SPI_CR = SPI_CR_SPIEN;
10210  u8g_MicroDelay();
10211 
10212  /* master mode, no fault detection, chip select 0 */
10213  SPI0->SPI_MR = SPI_MR_MSTR | SPI_MR_PCSDEC | SPI_MR_MODFDIS;
10214 
10215  /* Polarity, Phase, 8 Bit data transfer, baud rate */
10216  /* x * 1000 / 84 --> clock cycle in ns
10217  5 * 1000 / 84 = 58 ns
10218  SCBR > 50 *84 / 1000 --> SCBR=5
10219  SCBR > 300*84 / 1000 --> SCBR=26
10220  SCBR > 400*84 / 1000 --> SCBR=34
10221  */
10222 
10223  if ( arg_val <= U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_50NS )
10224  {
10225  SPI0->SPI_CSR[0] = SPI_CSR_SCBR(5) | 1;
10226  }
10227  else if ( arg_val <= U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_300NS )
10228  {
10229  SPI0->SPI_CSR[0] = SPI_CSR_SCBR(26) | 1;
10230  }
10231  else if ( arg_val <= U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_400NS )
10232  {
10233  SPI0->SPI_CSR[0] = SPI_CSR_SCBR(34) | 1;
10234  }
10235  else if ( arg_val <= U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_500NS )
10236  {
10237  SPI0->SPI_CSR[0] = SPI_CSR_SCBR(42) | 1;
10238  }
10239  else
10240  {
10241  SPI0->SPI_CSR[0] = SPI_CSR_SCBR(84) | 1;
10242  }
10243 
10244  u8g_MicroDelay();
10245  break;
10246 
10247  case U8G_COM_MSG_ADDRESS: /* define cmd (arg_val = 0) or data mode (arg_val = 1) */
10248  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_A0, arg_val);
10249  u8g_MicroDelay();
10250  break;
10251 
10252  case U8G_COM_MSG_CHIP_SELECT:
10253  if ( arg_val == 0 )
10254  {
10255  /* disable */
10256  u8g_MicroDelay(); /* this delay is required to avoid that the display is switched off too early --> DOGS102 with DUE */
10257  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS, HIGH);
10258  u8g_MicroDelay();
10259  }
10260  else
10261  {
10262  /* enable */
10263  //u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_SCK, LOW);
10264  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_CS, LOW);
10265  u8g_MicroDelay();
10266  }
10267  break;
10268 
10269  case U8G_COM_MSG_RESET:
10270  if ( u8g->pin_list[U8G_PI_RESET] != U8G_PIN_NONE )
10271  u8g_com_arduino_digital_write(u8g, U8G_PI_RESET, arg_val);
10272  break;
10273 
10274  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_BYTE:
10275  u8g_spi_out(arg_val);
10276  u8g_MicroDelay();
10277  break;
10278 
10279  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ:
10280  {
10281  register uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)arg_ptr;
10282  while( arg_val > 0 )
10283  {
10284  u8g_spi_out(*ptr++);
10285  arg_val--;
10286  }
10287  }
10288  break;
10289  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ_P:
10290  {
10291  register uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t*)arg_ptr;
10292  while( arg_val > 0 )
10293  {
10294  u8g_spi_out(u8g_pgm_read(ptr));
10295  ptr++;
10296  arg_val--;
10297  }
10298  }
10299  break;
10300  }
10301  return 1;
10302 }
10303 
10304 
10305 
10306 #else /* U8G_ARDUINO_ATMEGA_HW_SPI */
10307 
10308 #endif /* U8G_ARDUINO_ATMEGA_HW_SPI */
10309 
10310 #else /* ARDUINO */
10311 
10312 uint8_t u8g_com_arduino_hw_spi_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr)
10313 {
10314  return 1;
10315 }
10316 
10317 #endif /* ARDUINO */
10318 
10319 /*
10320 
10321  u8g_rot.c
10322 
10323  Universal 8bit Graphics Library
10324 
10325  Copyright (c) 2011, olikraus@gmail.com
10326  All rights reserved.
10327 
10328  Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
10329  are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
10330 
10331  * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list
10332  of conditions and the following disclaimer.
10333 
10334  * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this
10335  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other
10336  materials provided with the distribution.
10337 
10338  THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND
10339  CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
10340  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
10341  MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE
10342  DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR
10343  CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
10344  SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT
10345  NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
10346  LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
10347  CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT,
10348  STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE)
10349  ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF
10350  ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
10351

10353 */
10354 
10355 uint8_t u8g_dev_rot90_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg);
10356 uint8_t u8g_dev_rot180_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg);
10357 uint8_t u8g_dev_rot270_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg);
10358 
10359 uint8_t u8g_dev_rot_dummy_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
10360 {
10361  return 0;
10362 }
10363 
10364 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_rot = { u8g_dev_rot_dummy_fn, NULL, NULL };
10365 
10366 
10367 void u8g_UndoRotation(u8g_t *u8g)
10368 {
10369  if ( u8g->dev != &u8g_dev_rot )
10370  return;
10371  u8g->dev = (u8g_dev_t*)u8g_dev_rot.dev_mem;
10372  u8g_UpdateDimension(u8g);
10373 }
10374 
10375 void u8g_SetRot90(u8g_t *u8g)
10376 {
10377  if ( u8g->dev != &u8g_dev_rot )
10378  {
10379  u8g_dev_rot.dev_mem = u8g->dev;
10380  u8g->dev = &u8g_dev_rot;
10381  }
10382  u8g_dev_rot.dev_fn = u8g_dev_rot90_fn;
10383  u8g_UpdateDimension(u8g);
10384 }
10385 
10386 void u8g_SetRot180(u8g_t *u8g)
10387 {
10388  if ( u8g->dev != &u8g_dev_rot )
10389  {
10390  u8g_dev_rot.dev_mem = u8g->dev;
10391  u8g->dev = &u8g_dev_rot;
10392  }
10393  u8g_dev_rot.dev_fn = u8g_dev_rot180_fn;
10394  u8g_UpdateDimension(u8g);
10395 }
10396 
10397 void u8g_SetRot270(u8g_t *u8g)
10398 {
10399  if ( u8g->dev != &u8g_dev_rot )
10400  {
10401  u8g_dev_rot.dev_mem = u8g->dev;
10402  u8g->dev = &u8g_dev_rot;
10403  }
10404  u8g_dev_rot.dev_fn = u8g_dev_rot270_fn;
10405  u8g_UpdateDimension(u8g);
10406 }
10407 
10408 uint8_t u8g_dev_rot90_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
10409 {
10410  u8g_dev_t *rotation_chain = (u8g_dev_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
10411  switch(msg)
10412  {
10413  default:
10414  /*
10415  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
10416  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
10417  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_FIRST:
10418  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
10419  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_COLOR_ENTRY:
10420  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_XY_CB:
10421  */
10422  return u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10423 #ifdef U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION
10424  case U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION:
10425  {
10426  u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t *bbx = (u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t *)arg;
10427  u8g_uint_t x, y, tmp;
10428 
10429  /* transform the reference point */
10430  y = bbx->x;
10431  x = u8g->height;
10432  /* x = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g, rotation_chain); */
10433  x -= bbx->y;
10434  x--;
10435 
10436  /* adjust point to be the uppler left corner again */
10437  x -= bbx->h;
10438  x++;
10439 
10440  /* swap box dimensions */
10441  tmp = bbx->w;
10442  bbx->w = bbx->h;
10443  bbx->h = tmp;
10444 
10445  /* store x,y */
10446  bbx->x = x;
10447  bbx->y = y;
10448  }
10449  return u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10450 #endif /* U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION */
10451  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_PAGE_BOX:
10452  /* get page size from next device in the chain */
10453  u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10454  //printf("pre x: %3d..%3d y: %3d..%3d ", ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x1, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y1);
10455  {
10456  u8g_box_t new_box;
10457  //new_box.x0 = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g,rotation_chain) - ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y1 - 1;
10458  //new_box.x1 = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g,rotation_chain) - ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y0 - 1;
10459 
10460  new_box.x0 = ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y0;
10461  new_box.x1 = ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y1;
10462  new_box.y0 = ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x0;
10463  new_box.y1 = ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x1;
10464  *((u8g_box_t *)arg) = new_box;
10465  //printf("post x: %3d..%3d y: %3d..%3d\n", ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x1, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y1);
10466  }
10467  break;
10468  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_WIDTH:
10469  *((u8g_uint_t *)arg) = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g,rotation_chain);
10470  break;
10471  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_HEIGHT:
10472  *((u8g_uint_t *)arg) = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10473  break;
10474  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_PIXEL:
10475  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_TPIXEL:
10476  {
10477  u8g_uint_t x, y;
10478  y = ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x;
10479  x = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10480  x -= ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y;
10481  x--;
10482  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x = x;
10483  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y = y;
10484  }
10485  u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10486  break;
10487  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_8PIXEL:
10488  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_4TPIXEL:
10489  {
10490  u8g_uint_t x, y;
10491  //uint16_t x,y;
10492  y = ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x;
10493  x = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10494  x -= ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y;
10495  x--;
10496  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x = x;
10497  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y = y;
10498  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->dir+=1;
10499  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->dir &= 3;
10500  }
10501  u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10502  break;
10503  }
10504  return 1;
10505 }
10506 
10507 uint8_t u8g_dev_rot180_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
10508 {
10509  u8g_dev_t *rotation_chain = (u8g_dev_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
10510  switch(msg)
10511  {
10512  default:
10513  /*
10514  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
10515  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
10516  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_FIRST:
10517  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
10518  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_COLOR_ENTRY:
10519  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_XY_CB:
10520  */
10521  return u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10522 #ifdef U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION
10523  case U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION:
10524  {
10525  u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t *bbx = (u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t *)arg;
10526  u8g_uint_t x, y;
10527 
10528  /* transform the reference point */
10529  //y = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10530  y = u8g->height;
10531  y -= bbx->y;
10532  y--;
10533 
10534  //x = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10535  x = u8g->width;
10536  x -= bbx->x;
10537  x--;
10538 
10539  /* adjust point to be the uppler left corner again */
10540  y -= bbx->h;
10541  y++;
10542 
10543  x -= bbx->w;
10544  x++;
10545 
10546  /* store x,y */
10547  bbx->x = x;
10548  bbx->y = y;
10549  }
10550  return u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10551 #endif /* U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION */
10552  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_PAGE_BOX:
10553  /* get page size from next device in the chain */
10554  u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10555  //printf("pre x: %3d..%3d y: %3d..%3d ", ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x1, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y1);
10556  {
10557  u8g_box_t new_box;
10558 
10559  new_box.x0 = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g,rotation_chain) - ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x1 - 1;
10560  new_box.x1 = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g,rotation_chain) - ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x0 - 1;
10561  new_box.y0 = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g,rotation_chain) - ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y1 - 1;
10562  new_box.y1 = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g,rotation_chain) - ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y0 - 1;
10563  *((u8g_box_t *)arg) = new_box;
10564  //printf("post x: %3d..%3d y: %3d..%3d\n", ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x1, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y1);
10565  }
10566  break;
10567  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_WIDTH:
10568  *((u8g_uint_t *)arg) = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g,rotation_chain);
10569  break;
10570  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_HEIGHT:
10571  *((u8g_uint_t *)arg) = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10572  break;
10573  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_PIXEL:
10574  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_TPIXEL:
10575  {
10576  u8g_uint_t x, y;
10577 
10578  y = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10579  y -= ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y;
10580  y--;
10581 
10582  x = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10583  x -= ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x;
10584  x--;
10585 
10586  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x = x;
10587  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y = y;
10588  }
10589  u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10590  break;
10591  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_8PIXEL:
10592  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_4TPIXEL:
10593  {
10594  u8g_uint_t x, y;
10595 
10596  y = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10597  y -= ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y;
10598  y--;
10599 
10600  x = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10601  x -= ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x;
10602  x--;
10603 
10604  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x = x;
10605  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y = y;
10606  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->dir+=2;
10607  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->dir &= 3;
10608  }
10609  u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10610  break;
10611  }
10612  return 1;
10613 }
10614 
10615 uint8_t u8g_dev_rot270_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
10616 {
10617  u8g_dev_t *rotation_chain = (u8g_dev_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
10618  switch(msg)
10619  {
10620  default:
10621  /*
10622  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
10623  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
10624  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_FIRST:
10625  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
10626  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_COLOR_ENTRY:
10627  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_XY_CB:
10628  */
10629  return u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10630 #ifdef U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION
10631  case U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION:
10632  {
10633  u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t *bbx = (u8g_dev_arg_bbx_t *)arg;
10634  u8g_uint_t x, y, tmp;
10635 
10636  /* transform the reference point */
10637  x = bbx->y;
10638 
10639  y = u8g->width;
10640  /* y = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g, rotation_chain); */
10641  y -= bbx->x;
10642  y--;
10643 
10644  /* adjust point to be the uppler left corner again */
10645  y -= bbx->w;
10646  y++;
10647 
10648  /* swap box dimensions */
10649  tmp = bbx->w;
10650  bbx->w = bbx->h;
10651  bbx->h = tmp;
10652 
10653  /* store x,y */
10654  bbx->x = x;
10655  bbx->y = y;
10656  }
10657  return u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10658 #endif /* U8G_DEV_MSG_IS_BBX_INTERSECTION */
10659  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_PAGE_BOX:
10660  /* get page size from next device in the chain */
10661  u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10662  //printf("pre x: %3d..%3d y: %3d..%3d ", ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x1, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y1);
10663  {
10664  u8g_box_t new_box;
10665 
10666  new_box.x0 = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g,rotation_chain) - ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y1 - 1;
10667  new_box.x1 = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g,rotation_chain) - ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y0 - 1;
10668  new_box.y0 = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g,rotation_chain) - ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x1 - 1;
10669  new_box.y1 = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g,rotation_chain) - ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x0 - 1;
10670  *((u8g_box_t *)arg) = new_box;
10671  //printf("post x: %3d..%3d y: %3d..%3d\n", ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->x1, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y0, ((u8g_box_t *)arg)->y1);
10672  }
10673  break;
10674  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_WIDTH:
10675  *((u8g_uint_t *)arg) = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g,rotation_chain);
10676  break;
10677  case U8G_DEV_MSG_GET_HEIGHT:
10678  *((u8g_uint_t *)arg) = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10679  break;
10680  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_PIXEL:
10681  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_TPIXEL:
10682  {
10683  u8g_uint_t x, y;
10684  x = ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y;
10685 
10686  y = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10687  y -= ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x;
10688  y--;
10689 
10690  /*
10691  x = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10692  x -= ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y;
10693  x--;
10694  */
10695  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x = x;
10696  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y = y;
10697  }
10698  u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10699  break;
10700  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_8PIXEL:
10701  case U8G_DEV_MSG_SET_4TPIXEL:
10702  {
10703  u8g_uint_t x, y;
10704  x = ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y;
10705 
10706  y = u8g_GetHeightLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10707  y -= ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x;
10708  y--;
10709 
10710  /*
10711  x = u8g_GetWidthLL(u8g, rotation_chain);
10712  x -= ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y;
10713  x--;
10714  */
10715  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->x = x;
10716  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->y = y;
10717  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->dir+=3;
10718  ((u8g_dev_arg_pixel_t *)arg)->dir &= 3;
10719  }
10720  u8g_call_dev_fn(u8g, rotation_chain, msg, arg);
10721  break;
10722  }
10723  return 1;
10724 }
10725 
10726 uint8_t u8g_com_null_fn(u8g_t *u8g, uint8_t msg, uint8_t arg_val, void *arg_ptr)
10727 {
10728  switch(msg)
10729  {
10730  case U8G_COM_MSG_INIT:
10731  break;
10732  case U8G_COM_MSG_STOP:
10733  break;
10734 
10735 
10736  case U8G_COM_MSG_CHIP_SELECT:
10737  /* arg_val contains the chip number, which should be enabled */
10738  break;
10739 
10740 
10741  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_BYTE:
10742  break;
10743  case U8G_COM_MSG_WRITE_SEQ:
10744  break;
10745  }
10746  return 1;
10747 }
10748 /*
10749  u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864.c (dealextreme)
10750  Universal 8bit Graphics Library
10751 
10752  Copyright (c) 2011, olikraus@gmail.com
10753  All rights reserved.
10754  Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
10755  are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
10756  * Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list
10757  of conditions and the following disclaimer.
10758 
10759  * Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this
10760  list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other
10761  materials provided with the distribution.
10762  THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND
10763  CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
10764  INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
10765  MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE
10766  DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR
10767  CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL,
10768  SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT
10769  NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES;
10770  LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER
10771  CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT,
10772  STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE)
10773  ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF
10774  ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
10775 
10776 
10777 */
10778 
10779 #undef WIDTH
10780 #undef HEIGHT
10781 #undef PAGE_HEIGHT
10782 #define WIDTH 128
10783 #define HEIGHT 64
10784 #define PAGE_HEIGHT 8
10785 
10786 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_init_seq[] PROGMEM = {
10787  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
10788  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
10789  U8G_ESC_RST(1), /* do reset low pulse with (1*16)+2 milliseconds */
10790  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
10791 
10792  0x0e2, /* soft reset */
10793  0x040, /* set display start line to 0 */
10794  0x0a0, /* ADC set to reverse */
10795  0x0c8, /* common output mode */
10796  0x0a6, /* display normal, bit val 0: LCD pixel off. */
10797  0x0a2, /* LCD bias 1/9 */
10798  0x02f, /* all power control circuits on */
10799  0x0f8, /* set booster ratio to */
10800  0x000, /* 4x */
10801  0x023, /* set V0 voltage resistor ratio to large */
10802  0x081, /* set contrast */
10803  0x027, /* contrast value */
10804  0x0ac, /* indicator */
10805  0x000, /* disable */
10806  0x0af, /* display on */
10807 
10808  U8G_ESC_DLY(100), /* delay 100 ms */
10809  0x0a5, /* display all points, ST7565 */
10810  U8G_ESC_DLY(100), /* delay 100 ms */
10811  U8G_ESC_DLY(100), /* delay 100 ms */
10812  0x0a4, /* normal display */
10813  U8G_ESC_CS(0), /* disable chip */
10814  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
10815 };
10816 
10817 static const uint8_t u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_data_start[] PROGMEM = {
10818  U8G_ESC_ADR(0), /* instruction mode */
10819  U8G_ESC_CS(1), /* enable chip */
10820  0x010, /* set upper 4 bit of the col adr to 0 */
10821  0x000, /* set lower 4 bit of the col adr to 4 */
10822  U8G_ESC_END /* end of sequence */
10823 };
10824 
10825 uint8_t u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
10826 {
10827  switch(msg)
10828  {
10829  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
10830  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_300NS);
10831  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_init_seq);
10832  break;
10833  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
10834  break;
10835  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
10836  {
10837  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
10838  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_data_start);
10839  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | pb->p.page); /* select current page */
10840  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
10841  if ( u8g_pb_WriteBuffer(pb, u8g, dev) == 0 )
10842  return 0;
10843  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
10844  }
10845  break;
10846  case U8G_DEV_MSG_CONTRAST:
10847  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 1);
10848  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 0); /* instruction mode */
10849  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x081);
10850  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, (*(uint8_t *)arg) >> 2);
10851  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
10852  return 1;
10853  }
10854  return u8g_dev_pb8v1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
10855 }
10856 
10857 uint8_t u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_2x_fn(u8g_t *u8g, u8g_dev_t *dev, uint8_t msg, void *arg)
10858 {
10859  switch(msg)
10860  {
10861  case U8G_DEV_MSG_INIT:
10862  u8g_InitCom(u8g, dev, U8G_SPI_CLK_CYCLE_300NS);
10863  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_init_seq);
10864  break;
10865  case U8G_DEV_MSG_STOP:
10866  break;
10867  case U8G_DEV_MSG_PAGE_NEXT:
10868  {
10869  u8g_pb_t *pb = (u8g_pb_t *)(dev->dev_mem);
10870 
10871  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_data_start);
10872  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | (2*pb->p.page)); /* select current page */
10873  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
10874  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, pb->width, (uint8_t*)pb->buf);
10875  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
10876 
10877  u8g_WriteEscSeqP(u8g, dev, u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_data_start);
10878  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x0b0 | (2*pb->p.page+1)); /* select current page */
10879  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 1); /* data mode */
10880  u8g_WriteSequence(u8g, dev, pb->width, (uint8_t *)(pb->buf)+pb->width);
10881  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
10882  }
10883  break;
10884  case U8G_DEV_MSG_CONTRAST:
10885  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 1);
10886  u8g_SetAddress(u8g, dev, 0); /* instruction mode */
10887  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, 0x081);
10888  u8g_WriteByte(u8g, dev, (*(uint8_t *)arg) >> 2);
10889  u8g_SetChipSelect(u8g, dev, 0);
10890  return 1;
10891  }
10892  return u8g_dev_pb16v1_base_fn(u8g, dev, msg, arg);
10893 }
10894 
10895 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_sw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_fn, U8G_COM_SW_SPI);
10896 U8G_PB_DEV(u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_hw_spi, WIDTH, HEIGHT, PAGE_HEIGHT, u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_fn, U8G_COM_HW_SPI);
10897 
10898 uint8_t u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_2x_buf[WIDTH*2] U8G_NOCOMMON ;
10899 u8g_pb_t u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_2x_pb = { {16, HEIGHT, 0, 0, 0}, WIDTH, u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_2x_buf};
10900 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_2x_sw_spi = { u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_2x_fn, &u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_2x_pb, U8G_COM_SW_SPI };
10901 u8g_dev_t u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_2x_hw_spi = { u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_2x_fn, &u8g_dev_uc1701_mini12864_2x_pb, U8G_COM_HW_SPI };
